name: Ancestral Healing
text: Restore a minion\nto full Health and\ngive it Taunt.
flavor: I personally prefer some non-ancestral right-the-heck-now healing, but maybe that is just me.

name: Backstab
text: Deal $2 damage to an undamaged minion.
flavor: It's funny how often yelling "Look over there!" gets your opponent to turn around.

name: Beakered Lightning
text: Deal $1 damage to all minions. Overload: (2)
flavor: Working in a shaman's lab, it's important to be well-grounded.

name: Blur
text: Your hero can't take damage this turn.
flavor: "What are you trying to tell me? That I can dodge axes?" \n"I’m trying to tell you that when you’re a Demon Hunter, you won’t have to."

name: Circle of Healing
text: Restore #4 Health to ALL_minions.
flavor: It isn't really a circle.

name: Counterfeit Coin
text: Gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
flavor: There is something funny about this coin… can't quite put my finger on it…

name: Elemental Evocation
text: The next Elemental you_play this turn costs (2) less.
flavor: It's just lighter fluid.

name: Embiggen
text: Give all minions in your deck +2/+2. They cost (1) more (up to 10).
flavor: Did you set it to "wumbo?"

name: First Day of School
text: Add 2 random 1-Cost minions to your hand.
flavor: "Report to the bookstore to buy your books, the alchemist to buy your potions, and then get your wands at the… wandryroom?"

name: Forbidden Flame
text: Spend all your Mana. Deal that much damage to a minion.
flavor: WARNING: This flame is not to be used unless you are a licensed acolyte of the Old Gods.

name: Forbidden Healing
text: Spend all your Mana. Restore twice that much Health.
flavor: No one's quite sure why it's forbidden. And yes, that should make you nervous.

name: Forbidden Ritual
text: Spend all your Mana. Summon that many 1/1 Tentacles.
flavor: Actually, C'Thun gives his full support for this ritual.

name: Forbidden Shaping
text: Spend all your Mana. Summon a random minion that costs that much.
flavor: But the minion arrives covered in goo.

name: Forbidden Words
text: [x]Spend all your Mana.\nDestroy a minion with that\nmuch Attack or less.
flavor: Please confirm your age before reading this flavor text.

name: Freezing Potion
text: Freeze an enemy.
flavor: This is delicious! Oh no. BRAIN FREEEEEEEZE!

name: Inner Rage
text: Deal $1 damage to a minion and give it +2_Attack.
flavor: They're only smiling on the outside.

name: Innervate
text: Gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
flavor: Some druids still have flashbacks from strangers yelling "Innervate me!!" at them.

name: Lazul's Scheme
text: Reduce the Attack of an enemy minion by\n@ until your next turn. (Upgrades each turn!)
flavor: "What's that you're dreaming?\nYou're weak and you're screaming!\nIt must be my scheming..."

name: Lightning Bloom
text: Gain 2 Mana Crystals this turn only.\nOverload: (2)
flavor: Curiously, this plant never blooms in the same place twice.

name: Moonfire
text: Deal $1 damage.
flavor: "Cast Moonfire, and never stop." - How to Be a Druid, Chapter 5, Section 3

name: Mutate
text: Transform a friendly minion into a random one that costs (1) more.
flavor: You'll get the transformation you want when murlocs fly.

name: Pounce
text: Give your hero +2_Attack this turn.
flavor: Comes with an overwhelming urge to jump into the nearest open box.

name: Power Word: Shield
text: Give a minion +2_Health.
flavor: Sure the extra protection is nice, but the shield really reduces visibility.

name: Preparation
text: The next spell you cast this turn costs (2) less.
flavor: "Be Prepared" - Rogue Motto

name: Raise Dead
text: Deal $3 damage to your hero. Return two friendly minions that died this game to your hand.
flavor: Technically, it’s just really late healing.

name: Regenerate
text: Restore #3 Health.
flavor: Finally a cure for degenerates.

name: Sacrificial Pact
text: Destroy a friendly Demon. Restore #5 Health to your hero.
flavor: This is the reason that Demons never really become friends with Warlocks.

name: Shadowstep
text: Return a friendly minion to your hand. It_costs (2) less.
flavor: Rogue dance troops will sometimes Shadowstep away at the end of a performance.  Crowds love it.

name: Shifting Scroll
text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a random Mage spell.
flavor: Next turn, this is going to be AMAZING.

name: Silence
text: Silence a minion.
flavor: Reserved for enemy spellcasters, evil liches from beyond the grave, and karaoke nights at the Grim Guzzler.

name: Topsy Turvy
text: Swap a minion's Attack and Health.
flavor: "Help! I've fallen and I can't get down!"

name: Totemic Might
text: Give your Totems +2_Health.
flavor: Totem-stomping is no longer recommended.

name: Totemic Surge
text: Give your Totems +2_Attack.
flavor: It's not really advanced shamanic magic, you just draw nasty eyebrows on them.

name: Whispers of EVIL
text: Add a Lackey to your_hand.
flavor: Madame Lazul’s ASMR program is off to a promising start!

name: Zap!
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. Overload: (1)
flavor: The material components for this spell are wool socks and a rug.

name: Activate the Obelisk
text: Quest: Restore 15_Health.\nReward: Obelisk's Eye.
flavor: A one-eyed, one stone, towering purple minion healer.

name: Adaptation
text: Adapt a friendly minion.
flavor: Pray for salvation. If that fails, pray for extra horns or bigger teeth.

name: Adorable Infestation
text: Give a minion +1/+1. Summon a 1/1 Cub. Add a Cub to your hand.
flavor: Some cards are strong by sheer power; others draw strength from love.

name: Arcane Blast
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. This spell gets double bonus from Spell Damage.
flavor: Now with 100% more blast!

name: Arcane Breath
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a spell.
flavor: One of many side effects from eating mana cookies.

name: Arcane Missiles
text: Deal $3 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: You'd think you'd be able to control your missiles a little better since you're a powerful mage and all.

name: Arcane Shot
text: Deal $2 damage.
flavor: Magi conjured arcane arrows to sell to hunters, until hunters learned just enough magic to do it themselves.  The resulting loss of jobs sent Stormwind into a minor recession.

name: Athletic Studies
text: Discover a Rush minion. Your next one costs (1) less.
flavor: It's a quick read.

name: Autodefense Matrix
text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, give it Divine Shield.
flavor: We call it the bubble machine.

name: Avenge
text: Secret: When one of your minions dies, give a random friendly minion +3/+2.
flavor: Several paladins have joined together to deliver justice under the name "Justice Force".  Their lawyer talked them out of calling themselves the Justice League.
howToGet: Unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.

name: Awaken the Makers
text: Quest: Summon\n7 Deathrattle minions.\nReward: Amara, Warden of Hope.
flavor: They keep hitting the Snooze button.

name: Barkskin
text: Give a minion +3 Health. Gain 3 Armor.
flavor: Make like a tree… and gain armor.

name: Bazaar Burglary
text: [x]Quest: Add 4 cards from\nother classes to your hand.\nReward: Ancient Blades.
flavor: Just when you set up your "All-Natural Scented Candles" at the farmer's market and then some STUPID KOBOLD COMES AND TAKES THEM ALL!

name: Bestial Wrath
text: Give a friendly Beast +2 Attack and Immune this turn.
flavor: The seething wrath is just beneath the surface.  Beneath that is wild abandon, followed by slight annoyance.

name: Binding Heal
text: Restore #5 Health to a minion and your hero.
flavor: By accepting this healing, you agree to the following terms…

name: Biology Project
text: Each player gains 2_Mana Crystals.
flavor: Step 1: Grow giant evil strawberry.\nStep 2: ????\nStep 3: Rule Azeroth!

name: Blazing Invocation
text: Discover a Battlecry minion.
flavor: A lot of shaman have started vaping their invocations.

name: Blessing of Might
text: Give a minion +3_Attack.
flavor: "As in, you MIGHT want to get out of my way." - Toad Mackle, recently buffed.

name: Blessing of Wisdom
text: Choose a minion. Whenever it attacks, draw a card.
flavor: Apparently with wisdom comes the knowledge that you should probably be attacking every turn.

name: Blood To Ichor
text: Deal $1 damage to a minion. If it survives, summon a 2/2 Slime.
flavor: For his next trick, he turns the ichor back to blood and stuffs it back in you.

name: Boom Squad
text: Discover a Lackey, Mech, or Dragon.
flavor: Discover the meaning of squad goals.

name: Brain Freeze
text: Freeze a minion. Combo: Also deal $3 damage to it.
flavor: "The professor called on me, and I totally froze!"

name: Breath of Sindragosa
text: Deal $2 damage to a random enemy minion and Freeze it.
flavor: Is it cold in here or is it just Sindragosa?

name: Call of the Void
text: Add a random Demon to your hand.
flavor:
"Marco!"
"Polo!"
"Marco!"
"Who dares summon me?!"

name: Carrion Studies
text: Discover a Deathrattle minion. Your next one costs (1) less.
flavor: A good read but a little too much fluff.

name: Charge
text: Give a friendly minion Charge. It can't attack heroes this turn.
flavor: "Guys! Guys! Slow down!" - some kind of non-warrior minion

name: Claw
text: Give your hero +2_Attack this turn. Gain 2 Armor.
flavor: The claw decides who will stay and who will go.

name: Clear the Way
text: [x]Sidequest: Summon 3 Rush minions. Reward: Summon a 4/4 Gryphon with Rush.
flavor: The terrifying part is the gryphons' squeaky voices afterward.

name: Cloning Device
text: Discover a copy of a minion in your opponent's deck.
flavor: Zerek got sick of fighting over the remote.

name: Competitive Spirit
text: Secret: When your turn starts, give your minions +1/+1.
flavor: Competition can be an inspiration to improve oneself.  Or kill all the competitors.

name: Conceal
text: Give your minions Stealth until your next_turn.
flavor: Rogues conceal everything but their emotions.  You can't get 'em to shut up about feelings.

name: Consume Magic
text: Silence an enemy_minion.\nOutcast: Draw a card.
flavor: Please be mindful when consuming raw or undercooked magic.

name: Corrupt the Waters
text: [x]Quest: Play 6 Battlecry\ncards.\nReward: Heart of Vir'naal.
flavor: This is why Hagatha is banned from public pools.

name: Corruption
text: Choose an enemy minion. At the start of your turn, destroy it.
flavor: It starts with stealing a pen from work, and before you know it, BOOOM!  Corrupted!

name: Crystal Power
text: Choose One - Deal $2 damage to a minion; or_Restore #5 Health.
flavor: Often used as healing crystals, but also good for throwing at people.

name: Crystology
text: [x]Draw two 1-Attack\nminions from your deck.
flavor: "The Light is neither a particle nor a wave. It's more of a juice, really."

name: Daring Escape
text: Return all friendly minions to your hand.
flavor: Impossible to cast without cackling evilly.

name: Dark Pact
text: Destroy a friendly minion. Restore #4 Health to your hero.
flavor: "Don't worry about the fine print. Just sign here."

name: Dark Possession
text: Deal $2 damage to a friendly character. Discover a Demon.
flavor: Wanted on three counts of gnomish possession.

name: Deadly Poison
text: Give your weapon +2_Attack.
flavor: Rogues guard the secrets to poison-making carefully, lest magi start incorporating poison into their spells.  Poisonbolt? Rain of Poison?  Poison Elemental?  Nobody wants that.

name: Demon Companion
text: Summon a random Demon Companion.
flavor: Owning a pet can be real hell at times.

name: Demonic Studies
text: Discover a Demon. Your next one costs (1) less.
flavor: "Do you wanna summon a demon? I wanna summon a demon!"

name: Desperate Measures
text: Twinspell\nCast a random Paladin Secret.
flavor: Desperate times call for disparate secrets.

name: Devastate
text: Deal $4 damage to a damaged minion.
flavor: No thanks, I already devast-ate.

name: Devolving Missiles
text:
[x]Shoot three missiles
at random enemy minions
that transform them into
ones that cost (1) less.
flavor: Most intermural spell-dueling contests end with a field of wisps.

name: Divine Strength
text: Give a minion +1/+2.
flavor: Every year a few paladins get disqualified from the Westfall weight lifting championship for using Divine Strength.

name: Doomerang
text: Throw your weapon at a minion. It deals its damage, then returns to_your hand.
flavor: Guaranteed to return your weapon directly to your hand! (Wear gloves. Thick ones.)

name: Double Jump
text: Draw an Outcast card from your deck.
flavor: The key to every speed run.

name: Draconic Studies
text: [x]Discover a Dragon. Your\nnext one costs (1) less.
flavor: Our Draconic Studies program has a high rate of burnout.

name: Dragon's Hoard
text: Discover a Legendary_minion from another class.
flavor: The Alliance loves this hoard.

name: Earth Shock
text: Silence a minion, then deal $1 damage to it.
flavor: Earth Shock? Shouldn't it be "Azeroth Shock"?

name: Earthen Scales
text: Give a friendly minion +1/+1, then gain Armor equal to its Attack.
flavor: You can make your own Earthen Scales at home. Step 1: Roll around in the dirt. Step 2: Magic.

name: Elemental Allies
text: [x]Sidequest: Play an Elemental 2 turns in a row. Reward: Draw 3 spells from your deck.
flavor: Reno’s lucky he wasn’t caught by a fire elemental.

name: Embalming Ritual
text: Give a minion Reborn.
flavor: "Guess what! We're getting a new cat."

name: Evocation
text: Fill your hand with random Mage spells.\nAt the end of your turn, discard them.
flavor: You too could be the winner of the national spelling spree!

name: Evolve
text: Transform your minions into random minions that cost (1) more.
flavor: So you say you want an evolution. Well, you know. We all want to change the board.

name: Eye for an Eye
text: Secret: When your hero takes damage, deal_that much damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: Justice sometimes takes the form of a closed fist into a soft cheek.

name: Felosophy
text: [x]Copy the lowest Cost\nDemon in your hand.\nOutcast: Give both +1/+1.
flavor: "Like, isn't evil subjective man?"

name: Finders Keepers
text: Discover a card with_Overload. Overload: (1)
flavor: INFINITE LOOP!

name: Fire Plume's Heart
text: [x]Quest: Play\n7 Taunt minions.\nReward: Sulfuras.
flavor: Why does an active volcano need to be defended? To save its ash.

name: Flash Heal
text: Restore #5 Health.
flavor: Flash!  Ahhhhhhh~

name: Floop's Glorious Gloop
text: Whenever a minion dies this turn, gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
flavor: How much gloop could Floop's Gloop gloop if Floop's Gloop\ncould gloop gloop?

name: Font of Power
text: Discover a Mage minion. If your deck has no minions, keep all 3.
flavor: It's Comic Sans.

name: Forked Lightning
text: Deal $2 damage to 2_random enemy minions. Overload: (2)
flavor: If you combine it with Spooned Lightning and Knived Lightning, you have the full dining set.

name: Frost Shock
text: Deal $1 damage to an enemy character and Freeze it.
flavor: FROST SHOCK!

name: Getaway Kodo
text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, return it to your hand.
flavor: Get to da Kodo! Now!

name: Grim Rally
text: Destroy a friendly minion. Give your minions +1/+1.
flavor: There’s no “Aiiiieeee” in “Team.”

name: Hack the System
text: [x]Quest: Attack 5 times\nwith your hero.\nReward: Anraphet's Core.
flavor: Anything can be hacked, if you're holding an axe.

name: Hallucination
text: Discover a card from your opponent's class.
flavor: It's the good kind of hallucination.

name: Hand of Protection
text: Give a minion Divine Shield.
flavor: This spell has been renamed so many times, even paladins don’t know what it should be called anymore.

name: Hidden Wisdom
text: [x]Secret: After your opponent plays three cards in a turn, draw 2 cards.
flavor: Find your own wisdom. Perhaps behind the couch.

name: Holy Smite
text: Deal $3 damage\nto a minion.
flavor: It doesn't matter how pious you are.  Everyone needs a good smiting now and again.

name: Humility
text: Change a minion's Attack to 1.
flavor: This card makes something really damp.  Oh wait.  That's "Humidity."

name: I Know a Guy
text: Discover a Taunt minion.
flavor: Well… a guy who knows a guy.

name: Ice Lance
text: Freeze a character. If it was already Frozen, deal $4 damage instead.
flavor: The trick is not to break the lance.  Otherwise, you have "Ice Pieces."  Ice Pieces aren't as effective.

name: Improve Morale
text: [x]Deal $1 damage to a minion. If it survives, add a Lackey to your hand.
flavor: "The beatings will continue until MY morale improves."

name: Inner Fire
text: Change a minion's Attack to be equal to its Health.
flavor: Good idea: Buffing your minions.  Bad idea: Starting a conversation in the Barrens.

name: Into the Fray
text: Give all Taunt minions in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: "You are in my FRAY!"

name: Iron Hide
text: Gain 5 Armor.
flavor: Week 6. I remain covered head to toe with scales. They do not yet realize that I am not a dinosaur.

name: Jade Idol
text: Choose One - Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem; or Shuffle 3 copies of this card into your deck.@Choose One - Summon a Jade Golem; or Shuffle 3 copies of this card into your deck.
flavor: Shuffle or no guts.

name: Journey Below
text: Discover a Deathrattle card.
flavor: Don't stop believing there's something below.

name: Jungle Giants
text: [x]Quest: Summon 5 minions with 5 or more Attack. Reward: Barnabus.
flavor: Forming the Golakka Crater was the end of Barnabus' disastrous career as a dancer.

name: Lakkari Sacrifice
text: [x]Quest: Discard 6 cards.\nReward: Nether Portal.
flavor: They asked, “And what must we give in return?” Gul’dan lowered his hood and answered: “Six… cards…”

name: Learn Draconic
text: [x]Sidequest: Spend 8 Mana on spells. Reward: Summon a 6/6 Dragon.
flavor: Upon taking up the spellbook, Reno realized with a start: "I can't read."

name: Leeching Poison
text: Give your weapon Lifesteal this turn.
flavor: No actual leeches were harmed in the creation of this card.

name: Lesser Jasper Spellstone
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. @(Gain 3 Armor to upgrade.)
flavor:
In ancient woods, elves fought the curse
The demon’s shadow to disperse
But hatred raged and frail souls turned
Now horned and hooved their forests burned.

name: Light of the Naaru
text: Restore #3 Health. If the target is still damaged, summon a Lightwarden.
flavor: "Light it up!" - Command given to both Lightwardens and Goblins holding Flamecannons.

name: Lightning Bolt
text: Deal $3 damage. Overload: (1)
flavor: Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt!

name: Living Roots
text: Choose One - Deal $2 damage; or Summon two 1/1 Saplings.
flavor: 2 out of 2 saplings recommend that you summon the saplings.

name: Lost in the Jungle
text: Summon two 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits.
flavor: George and Karl were never heard from again.

name: Magic Trick
text: Discover a spell that costs (3) or less.
flavor: The world is not ready for an illusion of this depth and intricacy!

name: Making Mummies
text: [x]Quest: Play 5 Reborn\nminions.\nReward: Emperor Wraps.
flavor: "I do say, this gives me the vapors every single time!"

name: Mana Burn
text: Your opponent has 2 fewer Mana Crystals next turn.
flavor: One way to ensure that they are not prepared.

name: Mark of the Lotus
text: Give your minions +1/+1.
flavor: The mark of the Lotus is a little flower drawn in permanent marker on the ankle.

name: Mind Vision
text: Put a copy of a random card in your opponent's hand into your hand.
flavor: I see what you did there.

name: Mirror Image
text: Summon two 0/2 minions with Taunt.
flavor: Oh hey it's Mirror Image! !egamI rorriM s'ti yeh hO

name: Mortal Coil
text: Deal $1 damage to a minion. If that kills it, draw a card.
flavor: If your spells look like horrifying skulls, let's be honest, you should get to draw some cards.

name: Naturalize
text: Destroy a minion.\nYour opponent draws 2_cards.
flavor: Another one bites the dust.

name: Nature Studies
text: Discover a spell. Your next one costs (1) less.
flavor: "I have a first edition! Go ahead, count the rings."

name: Never Surrender!
text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, give your minions +2_Health.
flavor: But sometimes concede.

name: Noble Sacrifice
text: Secret: When an enemy attacks, summon a 2/1 Defender as the new target.
flavor: We will always remember you, "Defender!"

name: Omega Assembly
text: [x]Discover a Mech. If you\nhave 10 Mana Crystals,\nkeep all 3 cards.
flavor: They told Dr. Boom he could only pick one. He disagreed.

name: On the Hunt
text: Deal $1 damage.\nSummon a 1/1 Mastiff.
flavor: The mastiff giggles if you don't hit any ducks.

name: Open the Waygate
text: [x]Quest: Cast 8 spells that\ndidn't start in your deck.\nReward: Time Warp.
flavor: Although powerful, the incantation is simple. It’s just a jump to the left, and then a step to the right.

name: Overwhelm
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. Deal one more damage for each Beast you control.
flavor: Scholomance student Brewfest prank gone terribly, terribly awry.

name: Partner Assignment
text: Add a random 2-Cost and 3-Cost Beast to_your hand.
flavor: In every group assignment, someone does all the legwork.

name: Pilfer
text: Add a random card from another class to_your hand.
flavor: The class is always greener on the other side of the board.

name: Pint-Size Potion
text: [x]Give all enemy minions\n-3 Attack this turn only.
flavor: I hope you didn't disenchant your Shadow Word: Horror!

name: Plague of Flames
text: [x]Destroy all your minions.\nFor each one, destroy a\nrandom enemy minion.
flavor: This is fine.

name: Plague of Madness
text: Each player equips\na 2/2 Knife with Poisonous.
flavor: Don't bring a candle to a knife fight.

name: Play Dead
text: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle.
flavor: He's a very literal dog.

name: Potion of Madness
text: Gain control of an enemy minion with 2 or less Attack until end of turn.
flavor: You'd be insane NOT to drink it!

name: Power Overwhelming
text: Give a friendly minion +4/+4 until end of turn. Then, it dies. Horribly.
flavor: We cannot even describe how horrible the death is.  It's CRAZY bad!  Maybe worse than that.  Just don't do it.

name: Power Word: Glory
text: Choose a minion. Whenever it attacks, restore 4 Health to\nyour hero.
flavor: The promise of glory is a powerful tool to get minions to do your bidding.  Only slightly less powerful than the promise of an ice cream bar!

name: Praise Galakrond!
text: [x]Give a minion +1 Attack.\nInvoke Galakrond.
flavor:
"Turn to Galakrond, Chapter 3 Verse 12.

'SNARL! ROAR! GRAAAAGH!'

Let us reflect on this wisdom."

name: Primal Fusion
text: Give a minion +1/+1 for each of your Totems.
flavor: Golce and Dabbana have a new line of Earth Totems available at vendors everywhere this holiday season.

name: Primordial Studies
text: Discover a Spell Damage minion. Your next one costs (1) less.
flavor: A long forgotten tome whose very essence seeps of magic. 40 dust, used.

name: Psionic Probe
text: Copy a spell in your opponent's deck and add it to your hand.
flavor: She prefers calling it "Psionic Tickling."

name: Radiance
text: Restore #5 Health to your hero.
flavor: Because you're worth it!

name: Raid the Sky Temple
text: Quest: Cast 10 spells.\nReward: Ascendant Scroll.
flavor: "Why can't I hold all these scrolls?"

name: Rain of Fire
text: Deal $1 damage to all_characters.
flavor: You know it’s autumn when the skies rain brimstone and fire. Also: pumpkin spice!

name: Rapid Fire
text: Twinspell\nDeal $1 damage.
flavor: Pew! Pew!

name: Raven Idol
text: Choose One -\nDiscover a minion; or Discover a spell.
flavor: Was petrified when it found out it didn't make the cut for Azerothian Idol.
howToGet: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

name: Ray of Frost
text: Twinspell Freeze a minion. If it's already Frozen, deal $2 damage to it.
flavor: If you have zero chill, this can help.

name: Redemption
text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, return it to life with 1 Health.
flavor: I am not sure how you get demptioned the first time.  It’s a mystery!

name: Renew
text: Restore #3 Health. Discover a spell.
flavor: I am rejuvenated, I am renewed, I am my own nightlight!

name: Repentance
text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, reduce its Health to 1.
flavor: Repentance often comes in the moment before obliteration. Curious.

name: Righteous Cause
text: Sidequest: Summon 5 minions.\nReward: Give your minions +1/+1.
flavor: "And I hereby dub thee a cadet of the Explorer’s League! NEXT!"

name: Sacred Trial
text: Secret: After your opponent has at least 3 minions and plays another, destroy it.
flavor: You have chosen poorly.
howToGet: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

name: Sand Breath
text: [x]Give a minion +1/+2.\nGive it Divine Shield if\nyou're holding a Dragon.
flavor: After Uldum, EVERYONE had sand breath.

name: Savagery
text: Deal damage equal to your hero's Attack to a minion.
flavor: It is true that some druids are savage, but others still enjoy a quiet moment and a spot of tea.

name: Secret Passage
text: Replace your hand with 5 cards from your deck. Swap back next turn.
flavor: I use this to sneak out at night and do some villainous baking in the kitchen.

name: Secret Plan
text: Discover a Secret.
flavor: The secret is... There is no plan!

name: Secure the Deck
text: Sidequest: Attack twice with your hero. Reward: Add 3 'Claw' spells to your hand.
flavor: "Tied it down, boss. I don't really know why you asked me to do that."

name: Shadow Council
text: Replace your hand\nwith random Demons.\nGive them +2/+2.
flavor: Why is everybody in Outland replacing their hands?!

name: Shield of Honor
text: Give a damaged minion +3 Attack and Divine Shield.
flavor: "Sir, this shield would've been more helpful last turn!"

name: Shield Slam
text: Deal 1 damage to a minion for each Armor you have.
flavor: "What is a better weapon? The sharp one your enemies expect, or the blunt one they ignore?" - The Art of Warrior, Chapter 9

name: Shooting Star
text: Deal $1 damage to a minion and the minions next to it.
flavor: Literally starstruck.

name: Shriek
text: Discard your lowest Cost card. Deal $2 damage to all minions.
flavor: The first warning sign of an oncoming warlock temper tantrum.

name: Sinister Deal
text: Discover a Lackey.
flavor: "So, what's in the sack?" \n"Something... sinister." \n"Okay, it's a deal."

name: Sinister Strike
text: Deal $3 damage to the_enemy hero.
flavor: There's something about this strike that just feels off.  Sinister, even.

name: Smuggler's Crate
text: Give a random Beast in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: Are you sure these are the crates that are supposed to go to the Gadgetzan petting zoo?

name: Smuggler's Run
text: Give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: One of the most famous busts in Gadgetzan’s history happened on Smuggler’s Run, where Sergeant Sally apprehended a cadre of Grimy Goons transporting a massive number of illegal fish heads.

name: Soul Infusion
text: Give the\nleft-most minion in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: People called him a soulless monster. We're not sure this is better.

name: Soulfire
text: [x]Deal $4 damage.\nDiscard a random card.
flavor: Are you lighting a soul on fire? Or burning someone with your OWN soul? This seems like an important distinction.

name: Spirit Bomb
text: Deal $4 damage to a minion and your hero.
flavor: Might take a few episodes to power up.

name: Stampede
text: Each time you play a Beast this turn, add_a_random Beast to_your hand.
flavor: Many hunters long for the pitter-patter of enormous feet.

name: Storm's Wrath
text: Give your minions +1/+1.\nOverload: (1)
flavor: How many dragons does it take to destroy a hot air balloon? One, two, three, CRUNCH!

name: Strength in Numbers
text: Sidequest: Spend 10 Mana on minions.\nReward: Summon a minion from your deck.
flavor: One minion, two minions... tree minions!

name: Supreme Archaeology
text: Quest: Draw 20 cards.\nReward: Tome of Origination.
flavor: Archaeology is the discovery of rare and powerful artifacts. Supreme Archaeology is TAKING THEM!

name: Sword and Board
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. Gain 2 Armor.
flavor: Stab and Slab. Charge and Targe. Slash and Bash. You get the idea.

name: The Beast Within
text: Give a friendly Beast +1/+1, then it attacks a random enemy minion.
flavor: Undoes years of obedience school training.

name: The Caverns Below
text: [x]Quest: Play five minions\nwith the same name.\nReward: Crystal Core.
flavor: Why can't it ever be The Taverns Below?

name: The Last Kaleidosaur
text: Quest: Cast 6 spells\non your minions.\nReward: Galvadon.
flavor: “Impossible!” exclaimed the Silver Hand Recruit, his eyes filled with fear. Uther shook his head, turning the crystal until it caught the light: “Life finds a way.”

name: The Marsh Queen
text: [x]Quest: Play seven\n1-Cost minions.\nReward: Queen Carnassa.
flavor: Question: What's scarier, one giant angry dinosaur or 15 smaller vicious ones? Answer: AHHHHHHH THEY FOUND MEEEEEE

name: The Soularium
text: Draw 3 cards.\nAt the end of your turn, discard them.
flavor: Worst field trip ever.

name: Togwaggle's Scheme
text: Choose a minion. Shuffle @ |4(copy, copies) of it into your deck.\n(Upgrades each turn!)
flavor: "Many minions equals many treasures for king. Kobold arithmetic!"

name: Tome of Intellect
text: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
flavor: Just a compilation of napkins of intellect.

name: Totemic Smash
text: Deal $2 damage. Overkill: Summon a basic Totem.
flavor: Trolls are the first group to have a totem survive atmospheric re-entry.

name: Toxic Reinforcements
text: [x]Sidequest: Use your Hero Power three times. Reward: Summon three 1/1 Leper Gnomes.
flavor: In the event of a sudden loss of cabin pressure, a slingshot will be deployed for convenient evacuation.

name: Tracking
text: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Draw one and discard the_others.
flavor: For the person who just cannot decide what card to put into a deck!

name: Treenforcements
text: [x]Choose One - Give a minion +2 Health and Taunt; or Summon a 2/2 Treant.
flavor: Treemendous value!

name: Twin Slice
text: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn. Add 'Second Slice' to your hand.
flavor: The slice so nice, it'll cut you twice.

name: Unite the Murlocs
text: [x]Quest: Summon\n10 Murlocs.\nReward: Megafin.
flavor: Form feet and legs!  Form arms and body!  Oh.  Sorry.  I was thinking about Mechafin.

name: Unseal the Vault
text: Quest: Summon 20_minions.\nReward: Pharaoh's Warmask.
flavor: "Huh... That's a nice card back."

name: Unstable Evolution
text: Transform a friendly minion into\none that costs (1) more. Repeatable this turn.
flavor: They grow up so fast.

name: Unstable Felbolt
text: Deal $3 damage to an enemy minion and a random friendly one.
flavor: Warning! Your minions are seated in the splash zone.

name: Untapped Potential
text: [x]Quest: End 4 turns\nwith any unspent Mana.\nReward: Ossirian Tear.
flavor: The official term is "strategic laziness."

name: Upgrade!
text: If you have a weapon, give it +1/+1. Otherwise equip a 1/3 weapon.
flavor: Easily worth 50 DKP.

name: Voltaic Burst
text: Summon two 1/1 Sparks with Rush. Overload: (1)
flavor: Batteries have three components: Cathode, Anode, and Overload.

name: Wave of Apathy
text: Set the Attack of all enemy minions to 1 until your next turn.
flavor: "Flavor text? Eh. Can’t be bothered."

name: Whirlwind
text: Deal $1 damage to ALL_minions.
flavor: The way to tell seasoned warriors from novice ones: the novices yell "wheeeee" while whirlwinding.

name: Worthy Expedition
text: Discover a Choose One card.
flavor: This isn't where I parked my mount.

name: A Light in the Darkness
text: Discover a minion.\nGive it +1/+1.
flavor: Wait, how can you have a light in the dark?  If you turn on a light while it’s dark, doesn’t that mean it’s no longer dark?

name: Air Raid
text: Twinspell\nSummon two 1/1 Silver_Hand Recruits with Taunt.
flavor: It's difficult to get an air raid together. You have to get twenty-five people, and they all want to play a paladin!

name: Ambush
text: [x]Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, summon a 2/3 Ambusher with Poisonous.
flavor: Clip-clop clip-clop CLIP-CLOP STAB!

name: Ancestral Knowledge
text: Draw 2 cards. Overload: (2)
flavor: MOMMMMMYYYYYYYYY!!!

name: Ancestral Spirit
text: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Resummon this minion."
flavor: It was just a flesh wound.

name: Ancient Mysteries
text: Draw a Secret from your deck. It costs (0).
flavor: I'm not saying it was aliens, but it was TOTALLY aliens!

name: Arcane Explosion
text: Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: This spell is much better than Arcane Implosion.

name: Astral Rift
text: Add 2 random minions to your hand.
flavor: Let's see what's behind rift number one!

name: Bamboozle
text: [x]Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, transform it into a random one that costs (3) more.
flavor: "WE DO YOU A BAMBOOZLE, HOOMAN!"

name: Battle Rage
text: Draw a card for each damaged friendly character.
flavor: "You won't like me when I'm angry."

name: Bear Trap
text: Secret: After your hero is attacked, summon a 3/3 Bear with Taunt.
flavor: You'll never guess what's in that conveniently bear-sized, bear-smelling box.

name: Betrayal
text: Force an enemy minion to deal its damage to the minions next to it.
flavor: Everyone has a price. Gnomes, for example, can be persuaded by stuffed animals and small amounts of chocolate.

name: Big Bad Voodoo
text: Give a friendly minion "Deathrattle: Summon a random minion that costs (1) more."
flavor: Murlocs practice Small Nice Voodoo.

name: Blade Dance
text: Deal damage equal to your hero's Attack to 3 random enemy minions.
flavor: The surest way to clear the dance floor.

name: Bolster
text: Give your Taunt minions +2/+2.
flavor: The best offense is a good defense.

name: Bomb Toss
text: Deal $2 damage. Summon a 0/2 Goblin_Bomb.
flavor: Me throw face.

name: Book of Specters
text: Draw 3 cards. Discard any spells drawn.
flavor: Known throughout the land as the Spooky-nomicon.

name: Breath of Dreams
text: Draw a card. If you're holding a Dragon, gain an empty Mana Crystal.
flavor: Ysera has the worst morning breath.

name: Bring It On!
text: Gain 10 Armor. Reduce the Cost of minions in your opponent's hand by (2).
flavor: Brrr, it's cold in here. Let's hope she doesn't have an Auctioneer!

name: Call Pet
text: Draw a card.\nIf it's a Beast, it costs (4) less.

name: Cat Trick
text: Secret: After your opponent casts a spell, summon a 4/2 Panther with Stealth.
flavor: "I know some new tricks, a lot of good tricks. I will show them to you. Medivh will not mind at all if I do."

howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

name: Chaos Strike
text: Give your hero +2_Attack this turn. Draw a card.
flavor: "What do we want?" "CHAOS!"\n "When do we want it?"\n "WHEN LEAST EXPECTED!"

name: Cheap Shot
text: Echo\n Deal $2 damage to a_minion.
flavor: 50% off. Every shot must go!

name: Cheat Death
text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, return it to your hand.\nIt costs (2) less.
flavor: Reported.

name: Cleave

flavor: Hey you two…could you stand next to each other for a second…

name: Clever Disguise
text: Add 2 random spells from another class to_your hand.

name: Cold Blood
text: Give a minion +2 Attack. Combo: +4 Attack instead.
flavor: "I'm cold blooded, check it and see!"

name: Commanding Shout
text: Your minions can't be reduced below 1 Health this turn. Draw a card.

name: Confuse
text: Swap the Attack and Health of all minions.
flavor: This minion is really powerful!

name: Convert

name: Corrosive Breath
text:
[x]Deal $3 damage to a
minion. If you're holding
a Dragon, it also hits
the enemy hero.

text: Corrupt every minion. Destroy them at the start of your next turn.

name: Corsair Cache

name: Crackle
text: Deal $3-$6 damage. Overload: (1)

name: Crushing Hand

name: Cryostasis

name: Crystalsong Portal

howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

name: Curse of Weakness
text: Echo\nGive all enemy minions -2_Attack until your next_turn.

name: Cybertech Chip

name: Dark Conviction
text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 3.

name: Darkbomb
text: Deal $3 damage.
flavor: If you're looking to make an "Emo" deck, this card is perfect!

name: Dart Trap
text: Secret: After an opposing Hero Power is used, deal $5 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: Five years of tap-dancing lessons are FINALLY going to pay off!
howToGet: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

name: Dead Man's Hand
text: Shuffle a copy of your hand into your deck.

name: Defile

name: Demonfire
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it’s a friendly Demon, give it +2/+2 instead.

name: Demonfuse

text: Each player transforms a random minion in their hand into a Demon.

flavor: They're grateful for the help, but most minions would prefer not dying in the first place.

name: Devolve
text: Transform all enemy minions into random ones that cost (1) less.
flavor: Ragnaros looked down. He looked like some kind of War Golem. "WHAT HAVE YOU DONE TO ME," he yelled. But all that came out was a deep grinding sound. He began to cry.

name: Dinomancy
text: Your Hero Power becomes 'Give a Beast +2/+2.'
flavor: Anyone can dinomance. Just put your lips together and RAAWWWAARGGGH.

name: Dirty Tricks
text: [x]Secret: After your\nopponent casts a spell,\ndraw 2 cards.
flavor: "Ahh sand in my eyes! Also, I'm being stabbed."

name: Divine Hymn
text: Restore #6 Health to all friendly characters.
flavor: Taken up an octave, it's highly effective against stained glass golems.

name: Divine Spirit
text: Double a minion's Health.
flavor: Double the trouble. Double the fun!

name: Dragon Roar
text: Add 2 random Dragons to your hand.
flavor: Not to be confused with Dragon Yodel.

name: Drain Soul
text: Lifesteal\nDeal $2 damage\nto a minion.
flavor: Cleans even the toughest clogs with just a flick of the wrist!

name: Dreamway Guardians
text: Summon two 1/2 Dryads with Lifesteal.
flavor: They're a nightmare to deal with.

name: Earthen Might
text:
[x]Give a minion +2/+2.
If it's an Elemental, add
a random Elemental
to your hand.

name: Elementary Reaction
text: Draw a card. Copy it if_you played an Elemental last turn.
flavor: It's just a Tempest Tantrum.

name: Embrace the Shadow

name: Evasion

name: Eviscerate
text: Deal $2 damage. Combo: Deal $4 damage instead.

name: Execute
text: Destroy a damaged enemy minion.

name: Explore Un'Goro
text: Replace your deck with_copies of "Discover a card."

name: Explorer's Hat
text: Give a minion +1/+1 and "Deathrattle: Add an Explorer's Hat to your hand."
flavor: Harrison Jones was disappointed that he didn't get to be part of the League of Explorers, but his hat did.

howToGetGold: Can be crafted after starting the League of Explorers adventure.

name: Explosive Evolution
text: Transform a minion into a random one that costs (3) more.

name: Explosive Trap

name: Feast of Souls

name: Feign Death

name: Flame Geyser
text: Deal $2 damage.\nAdd a 1/2 Elemental to_your hand.

name: Flamecannon

name: Flare

name: Flash of Light
text: Restore #4 Health.\nDraw a card.

name: Forge of Souls
text: Draw 2 weapons from your deck.
flavor: Powerful weaponry forged by Bronjahm, the Godfather of Souls.

name: Freezing Trap
text: Secret: When an enemy minion attacks, return it to its owner's hand. It costs (2) more.
flavor: "Dang, that's cold." - appropriate response to Freezing Trap, or a mean joke.

name: Fresh Scent
text: Twinspell\nGive a Beast +2/+2.
flavor: *Sniff, sniff* Elite troops... *sniff, sniff* ...armed to the teeth and... *sniff, sniff* ...BAAACON!

name: Frostbolt
text: Deal $3 damage to a_character and Freeze it.

name: Gang Up
text: Choose a minion. Shuffle 3 copies of it into your deck.
flavor: If you are thinking about visiting Moonbrook, you better roll deep.

name: Heroic Strike

name: Hidden Cache

name: Holy Light
text: Restore #6 Health.
flavor: If you are often bathed in Holy Light, you should consider wearing sunscreen.

name: Holy Ripple
text: Deal $1 damage to all enemies. Restore #1_Health to all friendly characters.

name: Hunter's Mark

name: Immolation Aura

name: In Formation!

name: Incanter's Flow
text: Reduce the Cost of spells in your deck by_(1).

name: Jade Shuriken
text: Deal $2 damage.\nCombo: Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem.@Deal $2 damage.\nCombo: Summon a Jade Golem.

howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

name: Lesser Pearl Spellstone

In ages old, when Ancients broke
Azari of the Legion spoke
To tempt the mortals: gems of power
 The weak succumbed, their souls devoured.

name: Lesser Ruby Spellstone
text: Add 1 random Mage spell to your hand. @(Play 2 Elementals to_upgrade.)
flavor:
The final stone undid its master
Spun into wards by nameless caster
Azari wailed a savage roar
Now sealed in nether, evermore.

name: Maelstrom Portal
