howToGet: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

name: Quick Shot
text: Deal $3 damage.\nIf your hand is empty, draw a card.
flavor: Han shot first.
howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

name: Rampage
text: Give a damaged minion +3/+3.
flavor: Minion get ANGRY.   Minion SMASH!

name: Rat Trap
text: [x]Secret: After your opponent plays three cards in a turn, summon a 6/6 Rat.
flavor: MISSING: One giant rat. Please return to King Togwaggle.

name: Razorpetal Volley
text: Add two Razorpetals to_your hand that deal_1 damage.
flavor: The result of a fundamental misunderstanding of the phrase "flower power".

name: Rebuke
text: Enemy spells cost (5) more next turn.
flavor: When one buke just isn’t enough.

name: Reincarnate
text: Destroy a minion, then return it to life with full Health.
flavor: It's like birth, except you're an adult and you were just dead a second ago.
howToGet: Unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

name: Renounce Darkness
text: Replace your Hero Power and Warlock cards with another class's. The cards cost (1) less.
flavor: SEE YA DARKNESS!

name: Research Project
text: Each player draws 2_cards.
flavor: Abstract: Analyzing systemic applications of coldlight data sets vis-a-vis shuffle-related paradigms. Conclusion: Yay, cards!

name: Resurrect
text: Summon a random friendly minion that died this game.
flavor: I walked into the dungeon and noticed a slain adventurer. In his final moments, he had scrawled out a message in the dust on the wall beside him. Two words: "rez plz"
howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

name: Revenge
text: Deal $1 damage to all minions. If you have 12 or less Health, deal $3 damage instead.
flavor: This is better than Arcane Explosion, so I guess warriors are finally getting revenge on mages for Mortal Strike being worse than Fireball.
howToGet: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

name: Revenge of the Wild
text: Summon your Beasts that died this turn.
flavor: My roommates only use Revenge of the Passive Aggressive.

name: Rising Winds
text: Twinspell\nChoose One - Draw a card; or Summon a 3/2_Eagle.
flavor: Do not talk to me or my chick ever again.

name: Rockbiter Weapon
text: Give a friendly character +3 Attack this turn.
flavor: This would be real handy if your enemy is made of rock.

name: Rocket Boots
text: Give a minion Rush. Draw a card.
flavor: This is the happiest moment of Grik's life. We'll miss him.

name: Roll the Bones
text: Draw a card.\nIf it has Deathrattle, cast this again.
flavor: Call it: Heads or Tailbone…

name: Sanctuary
text: [x]Sidequest: Take no damage for a turn. Reward: Summon a 3/6 minion with Taunt.
flavor: Few quests are completed by cowering under a table.

name: Sap
text: Return an enemy minion to your opponent's hand.
flavor: Rogues love sappy movies.

name: Scavenger's Ingenuity
text: Draw a Beast.\nGive it +2/+2.
flavor: "A beast, barely alive. Gentlemen, we can rebuild it! Make it stronger, faster... spikier."

name: Seal of Light
text: Restore #4 Health to your hero and gain +2 Attack this turn.
flavor: The walrus of Light restores EIGHT Health.

name: Seance
text: Choose a minion. Add_a copy of it to your hand.
flavor: “The spirits spoke to me.”\n"What did they say?"\n"You had lethal two turns ago."

name: Shadow Visions
text: Discover a copy of a spell in your deck.
flavor: This one’s a bird. And here’s a bunny!

name: Shadow Word: Death
text: Destroy a minion with 5_or more Attack.
flavor: If you miss, it leaves a lightning-bolt-shaped scar on your target.

name: Shadow Word: Pain
text: Destroy a minion with 3_or less Attack.
flavor: A step up from a spell cast by many beginning acolytes: "Shadow Word: Annoy".

name: Shatter
text: Destroy a Frozen minion.
flavor: What's cooler than being cool?

name: Shiv
text: Deal $1 damage.\nDraw a card.
flavor: Rogues are experts at SHIV-al-ry.

name: Slam
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it survives, draw a card.
flavor: "Dun da dun, dun da dun": if you've heard an ogre sing this, it's too late.

name: Sleep with the Fishes
text: Deal $3 damage to all damaged minions.
flavor: If you're sleeping with the fishes, we highly suggest not bringing an electric blanket.

name: Snake Trap
text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, summon three 1/1 Snakes.
flavor: Why did it have to be snakes?

name: Snap Freeze
text: Freeze a minion.\nIf it's already Frozen, destroy it.
flavor: Lick the ice block. I triple-double-dog-dare-you.

name: Snipe
text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, deal $4 damage to it.
flavor: A great sniper hits the spot.  Just like a delicious flank of boar. Mmmmm.

name: Soul of the Murloc
text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Murloc."
flavor: Previously thought nonexistent.

name: Soul Shear
text: [x]Deal $3 damage to a\nminion. Shuffle 2 Soul\nFragments into your deck.
flavor: "Just a little off the sides please."

name: Sound the Bells!
text: Echo\nGive a minion +1/+2.
flavor: Weirdly, the bells stop ringing after 5.

name: Spectral Sight
text: [x]Draw a card.\nOutcast: Draw another.
flavor: "Pick a card, any card! Preferably the left- or right-most card."

name: Spirit Lash
text: Lifesteal\nDeal $1 damage to_all_minions.
flavor: We've got spirit, yes we do! We've got spirit, stolen from you!

name: Stolen Goods
text: Give a random Taunt minion in your hand +3/+3.
flavor: It fell off a kodo, I promise!

name: Stolen Steel
text: Discover a weapon (from another class).
flavor: Because Thrall wouldn't lend me Doomhammer.

name: Stormcrack
text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. Overload: (1)
flavor: WARNING: DO NOT TOUCH THE PURPLE BALL OF LIGHTNING

name: Subdue
text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 1.
flavor: Like humility but more humiliating.

name: Sudden Betrayal
text: Secret: When a minion attacks your hero, instead it attacks one of_its neighbors.
flavor: You thought he was your bro-bold, but turns out he's your foe-bold.

name: Sweeping Strikes
text: Give a minion "Also damages minions next to whomever this attacks."
flavor: Infinitely preferable to mopping strikes.

name: Thoughtsteal
text: Copy 2 cards in your opponent's deck and add them to your hand.
flavor: "What do you get when you cast Thoughtsteal on an Orc?  Nothing!" - Tauren joke

name: Toxic Arrow
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it survives, give it Poisonous.
flavor: What doesn't kill you makes you toxic.

name: Twisted Knowledge
text: Discover 2 Warlock cards.
flavor: People eat eight spiders in their sleep per year. Centaurs have two rib cages. Dwarves are just counterfeit titans.

name: Unstable Portal
text: Add a random minion to your hand. It costs (3) less.
flavor: The denizens of Azeroth have no idea how much work goes into stabilizing portals.  We spend like 30% of GDP on portal upkeep.

name: Venomstrike Trap
text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, summon a 2/3_Poisonous Cobra.
flavor: Snakes on a frozen plain.

name: Violet Haze
text: Add 2 random Deathrattle cards to_your hand.
flavor: Elite Tauren Chieftain's next hit single.

name: Wandering Monster
text: Secret: When an enemy attacks your hero, summon a 3-Cost minion as the new target.
flavor: Not all who wander are lost. This one is lost though, for sure.

name: Warpath
text: Echo\nDeal $1 damage to all_minions.
flavor: "Left, right, left, right, there's none of the enemy left… Right?"

name: Waxmancy
text: Discover a Battlecry minion. Reduce its Cost by (2).
flavor: The waxmancer works with flame and form, giving shape to figures warm. \n\nSome think he's a crazy creeper, but crafting minions is simply cheaper.

name: Weapons Project
text: Each player equips a 2/3 Weapon and\ngains 6 Armor.
flavor: Harrison Jones was kicked off this project.

name: Windfury
text: Give a minion Windfury.
flavor: Windfury is like Earthfury and Firefury, but more light and airy.

name: Witch's Brew
text: Restore #4 Health. Repeatable this turn.
flavor: The swill has eyes!

name: Witchwood Apple
text: Add three 2/2 Treants to your hand.
flavor: An apple a day keeps the worgen at bay.

name: Wrath
text: Choose One -\nDeal $3 damage to a minion; or $1 damage\nand draw a card.
flavor: The talk around the Ratchet Inn is that this card is too good and should be a Legendary.

name: Animal Companion
text: Summon a random Beast Companion.
flavor: You could summon Misha, Leokk, or Huffer!  Huffer is more trouble than he's worth.

name: Apotheosis
text: Give a minion +2/+3 and Lifesteal.
flavor: Defined as the absolute pinnacle of existence. Plus Lifesteal.

name: Arcane Intellect
text: Draw 2 cards.
flavor: Playing this card makes you SMARTER.  And let's face it: we could all stand to be a little smarter.

name: Awaken!
text: Invoke Galakrond. Deal_$1 damage to all_minions.
flavor: This is an alarm clock you can't ignore.

name: Bash
text: Deal $3 damage.\nGain 3 Armor.
flavor: You might think bashing doesn't take a lot of practice.  It doesn't.

name: BEEEES!!!
text: [x]Choose a minion.\nSummon four 1/1 Bees\nthat attack it.
flavor: Right before CEEEES!!!

name: Beneath the Grounds
text: Shuffle 3 Ambushes into your opponent's deck. When drawn, you summon a 4/4 Nerubian.
flavor: Can you hold these eggs for just a second?  I promise they're not full of giant enraged undead spider things.

name: Bladestorm
text: Deal $1 damage to all minions. Repeat until one dies.
flavor:
Dear minions: 

Woosh, woosh, woosh, woosh, woosh.

Best regards,
Bladestorm

name: Blessing of the Ancients
text: Twinspell\nGive your minions +1/+1.
flavor: Arguably the cutest blessing.

name: Blood Warriors
text: Add a copy of each damaged friendly minion to your hand.
flavor: They have an uneasy rivalry with the Blood Paladins.

name: Bloodfury Potion
text: [x]Give a minion +3 Attack.\nIf it's a Demon, also\ngive it +3 Health.
flavor: You know what really makes my blood boil? The skyrocketing price of Bloodfury potions!

name: Bogbeam
text: Deal $3 damage to_a minion.\nCosts (0) if you have at least 7 Mana Crystals.
flavor: Some think the mysterious bright lights in the bog are alien invaders, others think they're just swamp gas. Turns out, it's just druids.

name: Bouncing Blade
text: Deal $1 damage to a random minion. Repeat until a minion dies.
flavor: Only goblins would think this was a good idea. Even they are starting to have their doubts.

name: Breath of the Infinite
text: Deal $2 damage to all minions. If you're holding a Dragon, only damage enemies.
flavor: It's called "circular breathing."

name: Burgle
text: Add 2 random cards to your hand (from your opponent's class).
flavor: Yoink!

name: Call to Adventure
text: Draw the lowest Cost minion from your deck. Give it +2/+2.
flavor: Even the smallest minion can change the outcome of the game.

name: Cinderstorm
text: Deal $5 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: Forecast: "Cloudy with a chance of fireballs."

name: Coerce
text: Destroy a damaged minion. Combo: Destroy any minion.
flavor: "Give me your lunch money, or the sandwich gets it!"

name: Combustion
text: [x]Deal $4 damage to\na minion. Any excess\ndamages both neighbors.
flavor: Sally is friends with three Silverhand Recruits conveniently standing in a line. After casting this spell, how many friends does she have left? (Show your work.)

name: Coordinated Strike
text: Summon three 1/1_Illidari with Rush.
flavor: Undisputed champions of "Dancing with the Satyrs."

name: Counterspell
text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, Counter it.
flavor: What's the difference between a mage playing with Counterspell and a mage who isn't?  The mage who isn't is getting Pyroblasted in the face.

name: Dark Prophecy
text: Discover a 2-Cost minion. Summon it and give it +3 Health.
flavor: It's always a dark prophecy with Madame Lazul. Where's my happy, fluffy prophecy?!

name: Dark Skies
text: [x]Deal $1 damage to a\nrandom minion. Repeat\nfor each card in your hand.
flavor: "It's a drizzle of fire. A fine mist, really."

name: Deadly Shot
text: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavor: Our ballista operator is effective, but not picky.

name: Demonwrath
text: [x]Deal $2 damage to all\nminions except Demons.
flavor: Demons are not angry most of the time. You have to play this card in order to really bring it out of them.
howToGet: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

name: Divine Favor
text: Draw cards until you have as many in hand as your opponent.
flavor: This is not just a favor, but a divine one, like helping someone move a couch with a fold out bed!

name: Drain Life
text: Deal $2 damage. Restore #2 Health to your hero.
flavor: "I've just sucked one year of your life away."

name: Duplicate
text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, put 2 copies of it into your hand.
flavor: The one time when duping cards won't get your account banned!
howToGet: Unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

name: Effigy
text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, summon a random minion with the same Cost.
flavor: Burning man, brah.

name: Elemental Destruction
text: Deal $4-$5 damage to all minions. Overload: (5)
flavor: I'm not a shaman or anything, but isn't Elemental Destruction the opposite of what they want to do?

name: Envenom Weapon
text: Give your weapon Poisonous.
flavor: Like Deadly Poison, but deadlier.

name: Explosive Runes
text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, deal $6 damage to it and any excess to their hero.
flavor: Sometimes it's safer NOT to read the warning signs.

name: Extra Arms
text: [x]Give a minion +2/+2.\nAdd 'More Arms!' to your\nhand that gives +2/+2.
flavor: All the better to hug you with!

name: Eye Beam
text: Lifesteal. Deal $3 damage to a minion.\nOutcast: This costs (1).
flavor: Sometimes looks CAN kill.

name: Fan of Knives
text: Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions. Draw_a card.
flavor: I wouldn't say I LOVE knives, but I'm definitely a fan.

name: Far Sight
text: Draw a card. That card costs (3) less.
flavor: Drek'thar can't see, but he can see. You know what I mean? It's ok if you don't.

name: Feral Rage
text: Choose One - Give your hero +4 Attack this turn; or Gain 8 Armor.
flavor: Let's be honest. One option is a lot ragier than the other.

name: Feral Spirit
text: Summon two 2/3 Spirit Wolves with Taunt. Overload: (2)
flavor: Spirit wolves are like regular wolves with pom-poms.

name: Ferocious Howl
text: Draw a card.\nGain 1 Armor for each card in your hand.
flavor: Have you ever heard the wolf cry to the blue corn moon?

name: Flame Ward
text: Secret: After a minion attacks your hero, deal $3 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: Not to be confused with the burn ward.

name: Forgotten Torch
text: Deal $3 damage. Shuffle a 'Roaring Torch' into your deck that deals 6 damage.
flavor: Why does a forgotten torch turn into a roaring torch with no provocation?  It's one of life's many mysteries.
howToGet: Unlocked by starting the League of Explorers adventure.
howToGetGold: Can be crafted after starting the League of Explorers adventure.

name: Frost Nova
text: Freeze all enemy minions.
flavor: Hey man, that's cold.  Literally and metaphorically.

name: Frozen Clone
text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, add two copies of it to_your hand.
flavor: It's like déjà vu, times two.

name: Fungal Fortunes
text: Draw 3 cards. Discard any minions drawn.
flavor: Far superior to a beanstalk boondoggle.

name: Gift of Luminance
text: Give a minion Divine Shield, then summon a_1/1 copy of it.
flavor: You get a small version of yourself in a snow globe to remember the moment.

name: Gnash
text: Give your hero +3_Attack this turn. Gain 3 Armor.
flavor: It's rude to gnash with your mouth open.

name: Haunting Visions
text: The next spell you cast this turn costs (3) less. Discover a spell.
flavor: When you're awake at 3 AM and can't stop thinking about that time you called your teacher "mom."

name: Headcrack
text: Deal $2 damage to the enemy hero. Combo: Return this to your hand next turn.
flavor: When all else fails, nothing beats a swift whack upside the head.

name: Healing Rain
text: Restore #12 Health randomly split among all friendly characters.
flavor: It's filled with electrolytes!

name: Healing Touch
text: Restore #8 Health.
flavor: 8 Health, no waiting.

name: Healing Wave
text: Restore #7 Health. Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, Restore #14 instead.
flavor: Favored by shaman who study the art of restoration and healing, this spell would feel smug, if it had feelings.

name: Hunter's Pack
text: Add a random Hunter Beast, Secret, and weapon to your_hand.
flavor: Oh look! It's a trap!

name: Ice Barrier
text: Secret: When your\nhero is attacked,\ngain 8 Armor.
flavor: This is Rank 1.  Rank 2 is Chocolate Milk Barrier.

name: Ice Block
text: Secret: When your hero takes fatal damage, prevent it and become Immune this turn.
flavor: Ice is nice, and will suffice!

name: Impferno
text: Give your Demons +1 Attack. Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: Imps don't get mad when you set them on fire. They think it's cozy.

name: Infest
text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Add a random Beast to your hand."
flavor: The best part is the look on their face when you jump out of the cake! Err… corpse.

name: Jade Blossom
text: Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem. Gain an empty Mana Crystal.@Summon a Jade Golem. Gain an empty Mana Crystal.
flavor: Meditating under a jade blossom is said to grant you wisdom, unless you have a pollen allergy.

name: Kill Command
text: Deal $3 damage. If you control a Beast, deal\n$5 damage instead.
flavor: "Kill!", he commanded.

name: Landscaping
text: Summon two 2/2 Treants.
flavor: We'll put a happy tree right here... and give him a little friend.

name: Lava Burst
text: Deal $5 damage. Overload: (2)
flavor: It's like an ocean of liquid magma in your mouth!

name: Lightning Breath
text:
[x]Deal $4 damage to a
minion. If you're holding
a Dragon, also damage
its neighbors.
flavor: Recipe: One dragon, four wool socks, thick shag carpet.

name: Lightning Storm
text: Deal $2-$3 damage to all_enemy minions. Overload: (2)
flavor: An umbrella won't be effective, I'm afraid.

name: Mana Bind
text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, add a copy to your hand that costs (0).
flavor: Nice spell.  YOINK!

name: Mark of Nature
text: Choose One - Give a minion +4 Attack; or +4 Health and Taunt.
flavor: Druids call it the "Mark of Nature."  Everyone else calls it "needing a bath."

name: Master's Call
text: Discover a minion in your deck.\nIf all 3 are Beasts,\ndraw them all.
flavor: "Hello? Yes, this is Huffer."

name: Mimic Pod
text: Draw a card, then add a copy of it to your hand.
flavor: Jinx!

name: Mirror Entity
text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, summon a copy of it.
flavor: "You go first." - Krush'gor the Behemoth, to his pet boar.

name: Molten Blast
text: Deal $2 damage. Summon that many 1/1 Elementals.
flavor: Well, how would YOU celebrate after finals week?!

name: Mulch
text: Destroy a minion.\nAdd a random minion to your opponent's hand.
flavor: Is this a noun or a verb?  We will never know.

name: Muster for Battle
text: Summon three 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits. Equip a 1/4 Weapon.
flavor: "I'm bringing the guacamole!" – One of the most successful (yet rare) Silver Hand rallying cries

name: Netherwind Portal
text: Secret: After your opponent casts a spell, summon a random\n4-Cost minion.
flavor: More aromatic than a regular portal.

name: Nine Lives
text: Discover a friendly Deathrattle minion that died this game. Also trigger its Deathrattle.
flavor: Beware the night of the living pets!

name: Pilfered Power
text: Gain an empty Mana Crystal for each friendly minion.
flavor: The Hozen don't get paid much, but at least they get to keep any excess mana.

name: Plague of Murlocs
text: Transform all minions into random Murlocs.
flavor: This is horrible! And adorable!

name: Polymorph: Boar
text: Transform a minion into a 4/2 Boar with Charge.
flavor: It's always Huffer.

name: Potion of Polymorph
text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, transform it into a\n1/1 Sheep.
flavor: Tastes like Baaaaananas.

name: Powershot
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion and the minions next to it.
flavor: pow POW pow

name: Primal Talismans
text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a random basic Totem."
flavor: All that remained from the first kobold colony: a single talisman and the word "Flamestrike."

name: Protect the King!
text: For each enemy minion, summon a 1/1 Pawn with Taunt.
flavor: Form ranks! Everyone into the King's Tuskarr Defense!
howToGet: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

name: Rafaam's Scheme
text: Summon @ 1/1 |4(Imp, Imps). (Upgrades each turn!)
flavor: "When your first plan fails... imp-rovise."

name: Raiding Party
text: Draw 2 Pirates from_your deck.\nCombo: And a weapon.
flavor: And a bowl of chips. And some of those little cocktail weenies!

name: Ramming Speed
text: Force a minion to attack one of its neighbors.
flavor: Her deductible keeps going up.

name: Reckless Flurry
text: Spend all your Armor. Deal that much damage to all minions.
flavor: Look. Cautious Flurries will only get you so far in life.

name: Savage Roar
text: Give your characters +2_Attack this turn.
flavor: What do they roar? Nobody can quite tell, but it sounds like "Elephant Macho Breeze".  It's probably not that, though.

name: School Spirits
text: [x]Deal $2 damage to all\nminions. Shuffle 2 Soul\nFragments into your deck.
flavor: "B-E A-G-G-R-E-S-S-I-V-E!"

name: Seal Fate
text: Deal $3 damage to an undamaged character. Invoke Galakrond.
flavor: Firmly press the seal of your fates instead of leaving the flap open.

name: Seal of Champions
text: Give a minion\n+3 Attack and Divine Shield.
flavor: "Arf! Arf! Arf!" - Seal of Champions

name: Sense Demons
text: Draw 2 Demons\nfrom your deck.
flavor: Generally demons are pretty obvious and you don’t need a spell to sense them.

name: Serpentshrine Portal
text: Deal $3 damage. Summon a random 3-Cost minion. Overload: (1)
flavor: This is why you never flush a three-cost minion.

name: Shadow Bolt
text: Deal $4 damage\nto a minion.
flavor: It’s a Bolt.   It's made out of Shadow.   What more do you need to know!

name: Shadow Madness
text: Gain control of an enemy minion with 3 or less Attack until end of turn.
flavor: You can rationalize it all you want, it's still a mean thing to do.

name: Shadow Strike
text: Deal $5 damage to an undamaged character.
flavor: It's like a backstab, only from the front. And with two more stabs.

name: Shadowform
text: Your Hero Power becomes 'Deal 2 damage'. If already in Shadowform: 3 damage.
flavor: If a bright light shines on a priest in Shadowform… do they cast a shadow?

name: Shield Block
text: Gain 5 Armor.\nDraw a card.
flavor: Shields were invented because Face Block is USELESS.

name: Simulacrum
text: Copy the lowest Cost minion in your hand.
flavor: It's like déjà vu, times two.

name: Small-Time Recruits
text: [x]Draw three 1-Cost\nminions from your deck.
flavor: Now we know why they wear tiny watches.

name: Soul Cleave
text: Lifesteal\nDeal $2 damage to two random enemy minions.
flavor: The way to a demon's soul is through its stomach.

name: Spellbender
text: Secret: When an enemy casts a spell on a minion, summon a 1/3 as the new target.
flavor: While it's fun to intercept enemy lightning bolts, a spellbender much prefers to intercept opposing Marks of the Wild.  It just feels meaner.  And blood elves... well, they're a little mean.

name: Spirit Echo
text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Return _this to your hand."
flavor: I guess you can say they’re… “soul survivors.”

name: Splitting Image
text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, summon a copy of it.
flavor: Sometimes you get punched so hard they see double.

name: Spreading Madness
text: Deal $9 damage randomly split among ALL characters.
flavor: Most citizens of Darkshire wear those surgical masks to prevent spreading Madness to tourists.

name: Surrender to Madness
text: [x]Destroy 3 of your Mana\nCrystals. Give all minions\nin your deck +2/+2.
flavor: Never give up, always surrender!

name: Time Out!
text: Your hero is Immune until your next turn.
flavor: Highly effective against 3 year olds.

name: Totemic Reflection
text: Give a minion +2/+2.\nIf it's a Totem, summon a copy of it.
flavor: "Upon reflection, I have decided that your board needs more ME."

name: Treachery
text: Choose a friendly minion and give it to_your opponent.
flavor: Never look a gift minion in the mouth.

name: Twilight's Call
text: Summon 1/1 copies of 2 friendly Deathrattle minions\nthat died this game.
flavor: If you’re experiencing resurrection sickness, press 1.

name: Unexpected Results
text: [x]Summon two random\n$2-Cost minions (improved\nby Spell Damage).
flavor: Sometimes science is more art than science. A lot of people don’t get that.

name: Unidentified Elixir
text: Give a minion +2/+2. Gains a bonus effect in_your hand.
flavor: "Here, taste this." (Slurp) "What is it?" "I don't know, I found it in one of the labs."

name: Unleash the Hounds
text: For each enemy minion, summon a 1/1 Hound with Charge.
flavor: You must read the name of this card out loud each time you play it.

name: Unwilling Sacrifice
text: Choose a friendly minion. Destroy it and a random enemy minion.
flavor: Stand right... there. Perfect, perfect! Now don't move.

name: Vaporize
text: Secret: When a minion attacks your hero, destroy it.
flavor: Rumor has it that Deathwing brought about the Cataclysm after losing a game to this card.  We may never know the truth.

name: Velen's Chosen
text: Give a minion +2/+4 and Spell Damage +1.
flavor: Velen wrote a "Lovely Card" for Tyrande with a picture of the Deeprun Tram that said "I Choo-Choo-Choose you!"

name: Vivid Nightmare
text: [x]Choose a friendly minion.\nSummon a copy of it with\n1 Health remaining.
flavor: "I… I dreamed I accidentally crafted a golden Millhouse! It was so REAL!"

name: Volcanic Potion
text: Deal $2 damage to all_minions.
flavor: The secret ingredient in Kazakus's award-winning chili recipe.

name: Wild Growth
text: Gain an empty Mana Crystal.
flavor: Grow your own mana crystals with this Mana Crystal Growth Kit, only 39.99!

name: Witching Hour
text: Summon a random friendly Beast that died this game.
flavor: The gates to the Gilnean pet cemetary MUST remain locked at all times.

name: Academic Espionage
text: Shuffle 10 cards from your opponent's class into your deck. They_cost (1).
flavor: The tenth Pyroblast really felt like overkill.

name: Ancestor's Call
text: Put a random minion from each player's hand into the battlefield.
flavor: "Hey! Ancestors!" - Ancestor's call

name: Astral Communion
text: Gain 10 Mana Crystals. Discard your hand.
flavor: Hey!  Moon!  Can I have some mana crystals?

name: Avalanche
text: Freeze a minion and deal $3 damage to adjacent ones.
flavor: One of our more snowbally cards.

name: Bite
text: Give your hero +4_Attack this turn. Gain 4 Armor.
flavor: Chew your food!

name: Blade Flurry
text: Destroy your weapon and deal its damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: "Look, it's not just about waving daggers around really fast.  It's a lot more complicated than that." - Shan, Rogue Trainer

name: Blastcrystal Potion
text: Destroy a minion and one of your Mana Crystals.
flavor: There's a fine line between "potion" and "grenade". Wait. Actually, there's not.

name: Blessing of Kings
text: Give a minion +4/+4. (+4 Attack/+4 Health)
flavor: Given the number of kings who have been assassinated, are you sure you want their blessing?

name: Bloodbloom
text: The next spell you cast this turn costs Health instead of Mana.
flavor: Help save mana.  Donate blood today!

name: Branching Paths
text: [x]Choose Twice - Draw a\ncard; Give your minions \n+1 Attack; Gain 6 Armor.
flavor: Three paths diverged in a darkened hall, and I –\nI took the one less traveled by,\nAnd got eaten by a slime.

name: Call in the Finishers
text: Summon four 1/1 Murlocs.
flavor: When you really need a job done… but you don't really care if it gets done right.

name: Cataclysm
text: Destroy all minions. Discard your hand.
flavor: RUN FROM SKY CANDLES! THEY BURN! RUN!

name: Cone of Cold
text: Freeze a minion and the minions next to it, and deal $1 damage to them.
flavor: Magi of the Kirin Tor were casting Cubes of Cold for many years before Cones came into fashion some 90 years ago.

name: Conjurer's Calling
text: Twinspell\nDestroy a minion. Summon 2 minions of the same Cost to replace it.
flavor: If only you’d let it go to voicemail…

name: Consecration
text: Deal $2 damage to all_enemies.
flavor: Consecrated ground glows with Holy energy.  But it smells a little, too.

name: Dire Frenzy
text: Give a Beast +3/+3. Shuffle 3 copies into your deck with +3/+3.
flavor: It's always Huffer. And Huffer. And Huffer. And Huffer.

name: Dr. Boom's Scheme
text: Gain @ Armor.\n(Upgrades each turn!)
flavor: “We did it! We blew up the vault!”\n“You mean the vault door?”\n“Oh. The doooor…”

name: Echo of Medivh
text: Put a copy of each friendly minion into your hand.
flavor: Medivh's echo haunts Karazhan, eternally cheating at chess and Hearthstone.

name: Equality
text: Change the Health of ALL minions to 1.
flavor: We are all special unique snowflakes... with 1 Health.

name: Eternal Servitude
text: Discover a friendly minion that died this game. Summon it.
flavor: What do you mean I don't get overtime pay for this?!

name: Evolving Spores
text: Adapt your minions.
flavor: The most powerful mushrooms are commonly found in boxes marked with "?".

name: Fiendish Circle
text: [x]Summon four 1/1 Imps.
flavor: Like a knitting circle, but less evil.

name: Fiendish Rites
text: Invoke Galakrond.\nGive your minions +1_Attack.
flavor: "You have the right to sacrifice an ally. If you do not have an ally, then one will be sacrificed for you."

name: Fireball
text: Deal $6 damage.
flavor: This spell is useful for burning things.  If you're looking for spells that toast things, or just warm them a little, you're in the wrong place.

name: Fist of Jaraxxus
text: When you play or discard this, deal $4 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: * Not actually Jaraxxus' fist.

name: Flanking Strike
text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. Summon a 3/3 Wolf.
flavor: Wolves to the left and arrows to the right, here I am stuck in the middle with you.

name: Germination
text: Summon a copy of a friendly minion.\nGive the copy Taunt.
flavor: I regret asking how sporelings are made.

name: Glide
text: [x]Shuffle your hand into your deck. Draw 4 cards. Outcast: Your opponent does the same.
flavor: "Come with me, and you'll see, a whole new hand of possibly the same cards."

name: Grave Rune
text: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Summon 2 copies of this."
flavor: I'm gravely sorry to rune this.

name: Greater Healing Potion
text: Restore #12 Health to a friendly character.
flavor: Filled with electrolytes!

name: Hammer of Wrath
text: Deal $3 damage.\nDraw a card.
flavor: A good paladin has many tools.  Hammer of Wrath, Pliers of Vengeance, Hacksaw of Justice, etc.

name: Hellfire
text: Deal $3 damage to ALL_characters.
flavor: It's spells like these that make it hard for Warlocks to get decent help.

name: Hex
text: Transform a minion into a 0/1 Frog with Taunt.
flavor: If you Hex a Murloc... it really isn't much of a change, is it?

name: Holy Nova
text: Deal $2 damage to all enemy minions. Restore #2 Health to all friendly characters.
flavor: If the Holy Light forsakes you, good luck casting this spell.  Also, you're probably a jerk.

name: Imp-losion
text: Deal $2-$4 damage to a minion. Summon a 1/1 Imp for each damage dealt.
flavor: The shrapnel is waaaaay worse than the explosion.

name: Impbalming
text: Destroy a minion. Shuffle 3 Worthless Imps into your deck.
flavor: With your complexion, Imp Balm is a great demonizer.

name: Jade Lightning
text: Deal $4 damage. Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem.@Deal $4 damage. Summon a Jade Golem.
flavor: Jade Lightning, goooo Jade Lightning!

name: Juicy Psychmelon
text: Draw a 7, 8, 9, and\n10-Cost minion\n from your deck.
flavor: It's not juicy at all. IT'S JUST MESSING WITH YOUR HEAD.

name: Lesser Amethyst Spellstone
text: Lifesteal. Deal $3 damage to a minion. (Take damage from your cards to upgrade.)
flavor:
A purple stone Azari carved
For dark hearts, craving, power-starved.
The first to bow, the warlock Rin,
Embraced the darkness, slew her kin.

name: Mark of the Loa
text: Choose One - Give a minion +2/+4 and Taunt; or Summon two 3/2 Raptors.
flavor: Ah, yes. Mark. The mightiest Loa.

name: Marked Shot
text: Deal $4 damage to_a_minion. Discover_a_spell.
flavor: Obviously it's marked for greatness.

name: Mass Dispel
text: Silence all enemy minions. Draw a card.
flavor: It dispels buffs, powers, hopes, and dreams.

name: Mindgames
text: Put a copy of\na random minion from\nyour opponent's deck into the battlefield.
flavor: Sometimes it feels like this is all a game.

name: Molten Breath
text: [x]Deal $5 damage to a\nminion. If you're holding\na Dragon, gain 5 Armor.
flavor: Pizza so hot it burns OTHER PEOPLE’S MOUTHS.

name: Molten Reflection
text: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a copy of it.
flavor: Dang, I'm looking pretty hot!

name: Mortal Strike
text: Deal $4 damage. If you have 12 or less Health, deal $6 instead.
flavor: "If you only use one ability, use Mortal Strike." - The Warrior Code, Line 6

name: Multi-Shot
text: Deal $3 damage to two random enemy minions.
flavor: You see, it's all about throughput.

name: Oaken Summons
text: Gain 6 Armor.\nRecruit a minion that costs (4) or less.
flavor: The Guild used oak trees until they all turned to ash.

name: Overgrowth
text: Gain two empty Mana_Crystals.
flavor: Zangarmarsh: it's a fungal out there!

name: Poison Seeds
text: Destroy all minions and summon 2/2 Treants to replace them.
flavor: "Poisonseed Bagel" is the least popular bagel at McTiggin's Druidic Bagel Emporium.
howToGet: Unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

name: Polymorph
text: Transform a minion\ninto a 1/1 Sheep.
flavor: There was going to be a pun in this flavor text, but it just came out baa-d.

name: Potion of Illusion
text: Add 1/1 copies of your minions to your hand. They cost (1).
flavor: Unfortunately, there's no potion that can make you unsee all the faces in that bottle.

name: Power Infusion
text: Give a minion +2/+6.
flavor: It infuses, it enthuses, it amuses!

name: Predatory Instincts
text: [x]Draw a Beast from your\ndeck. Double its Health.
flavor: Somebody’s been eating their funnel cakes.

name: Prismatic Lens
text: Draw a minion and a spell from your deck. Swap their Costs.
flavor: Mined exclusively from the dark side of the moon.

name: Sabotage
text: Destroy a random enemy minion. Combo: And your opponent's weapon.
flavor: Rogues can't stand it. They know you planned it! They are going to set you straight!

name: Scorch
text:
[x]Deal $4 damage to a
minion. Costs (1) if you
played an Elemental
last turn.
flavor: The hoof.\nThe hoof.\nThe hoof is on fire.

name: Scrap Shot
text: Deal $3 damage.\nGive a random Beast in_your hand +3/+3.
flavor: Make your foe's armor your fauna's fashion!

name: Shadow of Death
text: Choose a minion. Shuffle 3 'Shadows' into your deck that summon a copy when drawn.
flavor: Making new friends takes skill.

name: Shadow Word: Horror
text: Destroy all minions with 2 or less Attack.
flavor: It's more succinct than "Shadow Word: Suck Into Vortex."

name: Shadow Word: Ruin
text: Destroy all minions with 5 or more Attack.
flavor: Discovered by a worgen priest after a giant spilled a drink on her new white robes.

name: Shadowflame
text: Destroy a friendly minion and deal its Attack damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: Start with a powerful minion and stir in Shadowflame and you have a good time!

name: Silvermoon Portal
text: Give a minion +2/+2. Summon a random\n2-Cost minion.
flavor: What's Millhouse Manastorm doing in Silvermoon?
howToGet: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.

name: Soul of the Forest
text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Treant."
flavor: "Reforestation" is suddenly a terrifying word.

name: Soul Split
text: Choose a friendly Demon. Summon a copy of it.
flavor: Spoiler: they're both the evil twin.

name: Swipe
text: Deal $4 damage to an enemy and $1 damage to all other enemies.
flavor: When a bear rears back and extends his arms, he's about to Swipe!  ... or hug.

name: The Dark Portal
text: Draw a minion. If you have at least 8 cards in hand, it costs (5) less.
flavor: Some say it's the source of Azeroth's greatest problems—aside from the gnomes.

name: Tidal Surge
text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. Restore #4 Health to your hero.
flavor: Also good for removing pesky stains.

name: Tinker's Sharpsword Oil
text: Give your weapon +3 Attack. Combo: Give a random friendly minion +3 Attack.
flavor: "Get ready to strike oil!" - Super-cheesy battle cry

name: Torrent
text: [x]Deal $8 damage to a\nminion. Costs (3) less if\nyou cast a spell last turn.
flavor: Weeks of underwater cross-training have really built up her fourarms.

name: Unsleeping Soul
text: Silence a friendly minion, then summon a copy of it.
flavor: It's 3 am. Do you know where your soul is?

name: Vendetta
text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. Costs (0) if you're holding a card from another class.
flavor: A vengeful and vicarious vanguard against violent villains or vexed victims.

name: Vivid Spores
text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Resummon this minion."
flavor: Hey man, I just feel like... death is just a construct of our imaginations, ya know?

name: Walk the Plank
text: Destroy an undamaged minion.
flavor: Pirates will fall for anything.

name: WANTED!
text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. If that kills it, add a Coin to your hand.
flavor: Wanted: Dead or Undead.

name: Wing Blast
text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. If a minion died this turn, this costs (1).
flavor: Emeriss uses Wing Blast.  It's super effective!

name: Wispering Woods
text: [x]Summon a 1/1 Wisp for\neach card in your hand.
flavor: We didn't actually fire the guy who named Dark Wispers.

name: Aeroponics
text: Draw 2 cards.\nCosts (2) less for each Treant you control.
flavor: Good seeds can go far.

name: Apexis Blast
text: Deal $5 damage.\nIf your deck has no minions, summon a random 5-Cost minion.
flavor: Lonely mages can still have a blast!

name: Assassinate
text: Destroy an enemy minion.
flavor: If you don't want to be assassinated, move to the Barrens and change your name. Good luck!

name: Baited Arrow
text: Deal $3 damage. Overkill: Summon a 5/5 Devilsaur.
flavor: The card is common, but the steak is rare.

name: Bane of Doom
text: Deal $2 damage to_a character. If that kills it, summon a random Demon.
flavor: My advice to you is to avoid Doom, if possible.

name: Blast Wave
text: Deal $2 damage to_all minions.\nOverkill: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
flavor: If you’re burning and you know it, wave your hands!

name: Blessed Champion
text: Double a minion's Attack.
flavor: This card causes double the trouble AND double the fun.

name: Blessing of Authority
text: Give a minion +8/+8. It_can't attack heroes this turn.
flavor: A paladin fights with honor! We don't go face... until next turn!

name: Bloodlust
text: Give your minions +3_Attack this turn.
flavor: blaarghghLLGHRHARAAHAHHH!!

name: Brawl
text: Destroy all minions except one. (chosen randomly)
flavor: Do you know the first rule of Brawl Club?

name: Cabalist's Tome
text: Add 3 random Mage spells to your hand.
flavor: What's in there? I bet it's cookie recipes!

name: Call to Arms
text: [x]Recruit 3 minions that\n cost (2) or less.
flavor: More personal than a text to arms.

name: Chaos Nova
text: Deal $4 damage to all_minions.
flavor: Illin' Illidan laying down the damage, flinging out the chaos as far as he can manage.

name: Cobra Shot
text: Deal $3 damage to a minion and the enemy hero.
flavor: "Cobra Shot" hurts way, way, way more than "Cobra Cuddle."

name: Command the Illidari
text: Summon six 1/1_Illidari with Rush.
flavor:
Give me an R! 
Give me a U! 
Give me an S! 
Give me an H! 
You two, you’re exclamation points!

name: Cutting Class
text: [x]Draw 2 cards.\nCosts (1) less per Attack\nof your weapon.
flavor: When you actually are the sharpest tool in the shed.

name: Deck of Wonders
text: Shuffle 5 Scrolls into your deck. When drawn, cast a random spell.
flavor: "Pick a card, any card. Wait! No! Not that one!" - Last words of previous owner

name: Demonheart
text: Deal $5 damage to a minion.  If it's a friendly Demon, give it +5/+5 instead.
flavor: Virtually every member of the pro demon lobby is a warlock. Weird.

name: Devour Mind
text: Copy 3 cards in your opponent's deck and add them to your hand.
flavor: A mind is a terrible thing to waste. Seconds, anyone?

name: Dragon's Breath
text: Deal $4 damage. Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
flavor: Dragons breathe fire, sure, but did you know they can also breathe Cotton Candy?  It's harder to give them a reason to do that, though.
howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

name: Dragon's Fury
text: Reveal a spell from your deck. Deal damage equal to its Cost to all_minions.
flavor: “C’mon Hucklemuck. She’ll never notice if we take just one little coin.”

name: Dragon's Pack
text: Summon two 2/3 Spirit Wolves with Taunt. If you've Invoked twice, give them +2/+2.
flavor: Each dragon's pack is guaranteed to have at least one rare.

name: Duel!
text: Summon a minion from each player's deck.\nThey fight!
flavor: If you don’t fight to the death, it’s Duel Yielding.

name: Excavated Evil
text: Deal $3 damage to all minions.\nShuffle this card into your opponent's deck.
flavor: MOM! DAD! DON'T TOUCH IT! IT'S EVIL!!!!!!
howToGet: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

name: Explosive Shot
text: Deal $5 damage to a minion and $2 damage to adjacent ones.
flavor: Pull the pin, count to 5, then shoot.  Then duck.

name: Feeding Time
text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. Summon three 1/1 Pterrordaxes.
flavor: True, they're only 1/1s, but they eat as much as most 4/4s!

name: Flame Lance
text: Deal $8 damage to a minion.
flavor: It's on the rack next to ice lance, acid lance, and English muffin lance.

name: Force of Nature
text: Summon three 2/2 Treants.
flavor: "I think I'll just nap under these trees. Wait... AAAAAHHH!" - Blinkfizz, the Unfortunate Gnome

name: Glowfly Swarm
text: Summon a 2/2 Glowfly for each spell in your_hand.
flavor: Glowflies are distant relations to spelling bees.

name: Hagatha's Scheme
text: Deal $@ damage\nto all minions.\n(Upgrades each turn!)
flavor: "All shall suffer!"\n"But Hagatha, those are your minions..."\n"I said ALL!!!"

name: Holy Water
text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. If that kills it, add a copy of it to your_hand.
flavor: For a healthier option, try Holy Water: Zero.

name: Holy Wrath
text: Draw a card and deal_damage equal to_its Cost.
flavor: C'mon Molten Giant!!

name: Hunting Party
text: Copy all Beasts in your_hand.
flavor: Not sure I’d call it a good party if everyone ends up beside themselves.

name: Ironforge Portal
text: Gain 4 Armor.\nSummon a random\n4-Cost minion.
flavor: Come to beautiful Ironforge! Where irons are forged and the forges are iron!
howToGet: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

name: Kara Kazham!
text: Summon a 1/1 Candle, 2/2 Broom, and 3/3 Teapot.
flavor: This is what happens when you tell Khadgar to set the table.
howToGet: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.

name: Lesser Emerald Spellstone
text: Summon two 3/3_Wolves. (Play a Secret to upgrade.)
flavor:
An emerald stone for Tauren hands
Who sought its strength to save their lands
Their tribes now lost, their rage released
Who’s hunting now? And who’s the beast?

name: Lesser Onyx Spellstone
text: Destroy 1 random enemy minion.\n@(Play 3 Deathrattle cards to upgrade.)
flavor:
The trolls of old embraced the gift
A jewel of black for daggers swift
No party lasts who finds the stone
Those wielding it soon stand alone.

name: Libram of Justice
text: Equip a 1/4 weapon. Change the Health of all enemy minions to 1.
flavor: Proper justice. Throw the book at him!

name: Living Mana
text: Transform your Mana Crystals into 2/2 Treants. Recover the mana when they die.
flavor: If you truly love your mana, set it free.

name: Lunar Visions
text: Draw 2 cards. Minions drawn cost (2) less.
flavor: The true mystery of lunar visions is how there is nothing to watch when there are so many channels.

name: Mass Hysteria
text: Force each minion to_attack another random minion.
flavor: Black Friday gets worse every year.

name: Metamorphosis
text: Swap your Hero Power to "Deal 4 damage." After 2 uses, swap it back.
flavor: As the humble caterpillar becomes a beautiful butterfly, so too does a demon hunter become a hideous mass of writhing destruction and unfettered chaos.

name: Myra's Unstable Element
text: Draw the rest of\nyour deck.
flavor: What could go wrong?

name: Necrium Vial
text: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle twice.
flavor: Two near-death experiences for the price of one!

name: Plague of Wrath
text: Destroy all damaged minions.
flavor: "Thanks, I HATE it!"

name: Power Word: Replicate
text: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a 5/5 copy of it.
flavor: Available as a bundle, along with Power Words: Detonate, Animate, Annihilate, and Paper Weight.

name: Power Word: Tentacles
text: Give a minion +2/+6.
flavor: Because you're wrapped in a protective layer of… tentacles?

name: Psyche Split
text: Give a minion +1/+2. Summon a copy of it.
flavor: This is how the arakkoa make friends.

name: Righteousness
text: Give your minions Divine Shield.
flavor: Shield yourself in righteousness! It feels like a warm fuzzy blanket.

name: Rolling Fireball
text: Deal $8 damage to a minion. Any excess damage continues to\nthe left or right.
flavor: Why don't they ever run perpendicular?

name: Shrink Ray
text: Set the Attack and Health of all minions\nto 1.
flavor: Actually works by enlarging the rest of the world.

name: Solemn Vigil
text: Draw 2 cards. Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
flavor: Each year, folk gather in front of Blackrock Mountain to mourn those who were mind-controlled into the lava.
howToGet: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

name: Stand Against Darkness
text: Summon five 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits.
flavor: Or if you're too tired, you can just kind of lean against the darkness.

name: Starfall
text: Choose One -\nDeal $5 damage to a minion; or $2 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: Is the sky falling?  Yes.  Yes it is.

name: Sudden Genesis
text: Summon copies of your damaged minions.
flavor: Being hurt can make you another person.

name: Time Rip
text: Destroy a minion.\nInvoke Galakrond.
flavor: "It's time. R.I.P."

name: Volcano
text: Deal $15 damage randomly split among all_minions.\nOverload: (2)
flavor: Many young shaman summon a volcano as their first school project.

name: Webweave
text: Summon two 1/2 Poisonous Spiders.
flavor: O, what a tangled web we weave, hoping spiders dodge the cleave.

name: Avenging Wrath
text: Deal $8 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham!

name: Ball of Spiders
text: Summon three 1/1 Webspinners.
flavor: "THEY'RE EVERYWHERE GET THEM OFF!!!" - Everyone

name: Blizzard
text: Deal $2 damage to all enemy minions and Freeze them.
flavor: This spell can be very Entertaining.

name: Candle Breath
text: Draw 3 cards. Costs (3)_less while you're holding a Dragon.
flavor: "And Waxadred shall light their fires, with roaring breath hotter than pyres!\n \nCome before him, scamp and vandal, pledge your faith and lift your candle!"

name: Cannon Barrage
text: [x]Deal $3 damage to a\nrandom enemy. Repeat\nfor each of your Pirates.
flavor: Why fire your cannons strategically when you can fire them all at once?

name: Dark Bargain
text: Destroy 2 random enemy minions. Discard 2 random cards.
flavor: A prime example of lose-lose negotiating.

name: Dark Wispers
text: Choose One - Summon 5 Wisps; or Give_a minion +5/+5 and Taunt.
flavor: Don't worry; we fired the person who named this card.

name: Darkest Hour
text: Destroy all friendly minions. For each one, summon a random minion from your deck.
flavor: It's always darkest just before you find the light switch.

name: Deadly Arsenal
text: Reveal a weapon from your deck. Deal its Attack to all minions.
flavor: Oh look. A Gorehowl.

name: Dragonfire Potion
text: [x]Deal $5 damage to all\nminions except Dragons.
flavor: No one was brave enough to fire the dragon in person… so they made the potion do it.

name: Ectomancy
text: Summon copies of all Demons you control.
flavor: "Zerek! Stay out of my lab!"

name: Embrace Darkness
text: [x]Choose an enemy minion.\nAt the start of your turn,\ngain control of it.
flavor: Once you both get comfortable, darkness is actually pretty snuggly.

name: Enter the Coliseum
text: Destroy all minions except each player's highest Attack minion.
flavor: You have to get past the vendors first.  So many are lost to shopping...

name: Entomb
text: Choose an enemy minion.\nShuffle it into your deck.
flavor: It's perfectly safe as long as you remember to put in air holes.
howToGet: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

name: Eureka!
text: Summon a copy of_a_random minion from your hand.
flavor: Genius is 1% inspiration, and 99% drawing your Deathwing.

name: Felfire Potion
text: Deal $5 damage to all characters.
flavor: Kazakus has a squad of imps bottling Felfire round-the-clock and he *still* can't keep up with demand.

name: Gather Your Party
text: Recruit a minion.
flavor: Thrilling adventure! Danger guaranteed! Loot uncertain! Death optional!  Who’s with me?

name: Hand of Gul'dan
text: When you play\nor discard this,\ndraw 3 cards.
flavor: His skull also draws three cards. Imagine how many cards he could draw with HIS ENTIRE BODY!

name: Heavy Metal!
text: [x]Summon a random\nminion with Cost equal\nto your Armor (up to 10).
flavor: This metal is so heavy it will satisfy your iron requirements for the next year.

name: Hidden Oasis
text: Choose One - Summon a 6/6 Ancient with Taunt; or Restore #12 Health.
flavor: Amazing that it's been hidden, given the twenty-foot treant splashing around in it.

name: Holy Fire
text: Deal $5 damage. Restore #5 Health to your hero.
flavor: Often followed by Holy Smokes!

name: Initiation
text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. If that kills it, summon a new copy.
flavor: The things a murloc's gotta go through to graduate from Scholomance…

name: Level Up!
text: Give your Silver Hand Recruits +2/+2 and_Taunt.
flavor: Ding!\n\nGrats.

name: Lightbomb
text: Deal damage to each minion equal to its Attack.
flavor: This is what happens when you allow goblins to be priests.

name: Meteor
text: Deal $15 damage to a minion and $3 damage to adjacent ones.
flavor: When you absolutely, positively have to kill all the dinosaurs.

name: Moonglade Portal
text: Restore #6 Health. Summon a random\n6-Cost minion.
flavor: Ain't no party like a Moonglade party ‘cause a Moonglade party got bears.
howToGet: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

name: Nourish
text: Choose One - Gain 2_Mana Crystals; or Draw 3 cards.
flavor: Druids take nourishment from many things: the power of nature, the songbird's chirp, a chocolate cake.

name: Pharaoh's Blessing
text: Give a minion +4/+4, Divine Shield, and Taunt.
flavor: Life hack: Sneeze near a pharaoh.

name: Rain of Toads
text: Summon three 2/4 Toads with Taunt. Overload: (3)
flavor: "Oh, THAT'S how she brings the warts!"

name: Recycle
text: Shuffle an enemy minion into your opponent's deck.
flavor: Druidic recycling involves putting plastics in one bin and enemy minions in another bin.

name: Runic Carvings
text: Choose One - Summon four 2/2 Treant Totems; or Overload: (2) to summon them with Rush.
flavor: "That totem was beautiful… and you runed it!"

name: Shadow Essence
text: Summon a 5/5 copy of_a random minion in_your deck.
flavor: Difficult to bottle up and sell. But it packs a punch.

name: Siphon Soul
text: Destroy a minion. Restore #3 Health to_your hero.
flavor: You probably should avoid siphoning your own soul.  You might create some kind of weird infinite loop.

name: Skull of Gul'dan
text: Draw 3 cards.\nOutcast: Reduce their Cost by (3).
flavor: A fellow of evil possessed, of most devious shadow. He hath turned on his kin a thousand times, and now, how abhorred in all imagination he is!

name: Spikeridged Steed
text: Give a minion +2/+6 and Taunt. When it dies, summon a Stegodon.
flavor: What beats cavalry? Dinosaur cavalry.

name: Spreading Plague
text: Summon a 1/5 Scarab with Taunt. If your_opponent has more minions, cast this again.
flavor: In the past, plagues were spread by mice or fleas. These days they're spread by elves.

name: Stampeding Roar
text: Summon a random Beast from your hand and give it Rush.
flavor: [x]The Gurubashi Arena has an\nextremely permissive policy on\npets in the workplace.

name: Starfire
text: Deal $5 damage.\nDraw a card.
flavor: Balance is important to druids.  This card is perfectly balanced.

name: Swarm of Locusts
text: Summon seven 1/1 Locusts with Rush.
flavor: Good things never come in swarms.

name: The Storm Bringer
text: Transform your minions into random Legendary minions.
flavor: Finally, Electra can work from home.

name: Thistle Tea
text: Draw a card. Add 2 extra copies of it to your hand.
flavor: Aren't Thistles prickly?  Why would you drink them? I don't get Rogues.

name: To My Side!
text: [x]Summon an Animal\nCompanion, or 2 if your\ndeck has no minions.
flavor: I hunt alone.  Well, me and Misha.  And Huffer.  And Leokk.

name: Unidentified Contract
text: Destroy a minion. Gains a bonus effect in_your hand.
flavor: The terms of service are constantly changing.

name: Unidentified Shield
text: Gain 5 Armor.\nGains a bonus effect in_your hand.
flavor: The kobold stared at the bundle for a long time. “Ah hah!” he said. “It’s a shield.”

name: Unleash the Beast
text: Twinspell\nSummon a 5/5 Wyvern with Rush.
flavor: The Kirin Tor have always been lax in enforcing leash laws.

name: Vanish
text: Return all minions to their owner's hand.

name: A New Challenger...
text: Discover a 6-Cost minion. Summon it with Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavor: … Arrives? Approaches? TELL US ALREADY!

name: Commencement
text: Summon a minion from your deck. Give it Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavor: "Remember, graduates—you carry a heavy weight on your shoulders now."

name: Crush
text: Destroy a minion. If you have a damaged minion, this costs (4) less.
flavor: Using this card on your enemies is one of the best things in life, according to some barbarians.

name: Crushing Walls
text: Destroy your opponent's left and right-most minions.
flavor: "It could be worse!" "It's worse."

name: Cycle of Hatred
text: Deal $3 damage to all minions. Summon a 3/3 Spirit for every minion killed.
flavor: If you run 2 of these, would that make it the bi-cycle of hatred?

name: Earthquake
text: Deal $5 damage to all minions, then deal $2 damage to all minions.
flavor: Shake it, sh-sh-sh-shake it like a Kalimdor fissure.

name: Everyfin is Awesome
text: Give your minions +2/+2.\nCosts (1) less for each Murloc you control.
flavor: Everyfin is cool when you're part of a murloc team!
howToGet: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

name: Fel Guardians
text: Summon three 1/2 Demons with Taunt. Costs (1) less whenever a_friendly minion dies.
flavor: What happened after the guardians tripped? They Fel.

name: Firelands Portal
text: Deal $5 damage. Summon a random\n5-Cost minion.
flavor: Come to beautiful Firelands! Where it's "Way nicer than the Abyssal Maw!"
howToGet: Unlocked in the Prologue, in One Night in Karazhan.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Prologue, in One Night in Karazhan.

name: Flamestrike
text: Deal $4 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: When the ground is on fire, you should not stop, drop, and roll.

name: Flark's Boom-Zooka
text: [x]Summon 3 minions from\nyour deck. They attack\nenemy minions, then die.
flavor: It used to be a Ba-zooka but we ran out of sheep.

name: Greater Arcane Missiles
text: Shoot three missiles at random enemies that deal $3 damage each.
flavor: Wow, and I thought Arcane Missiles was great!

name: Guardian Animals
text: Summon two Beasts that cost (5) or less from your deck. Give_them Rush.
flavor: The guidelines specifically state: "Students may also bring an ironbeak owl OR an alleycat OR a toad." They never said how big.

name: Kangor's Endless Army
text: Resurrect 3 friendly Mechs. They keep any Magnetic upgrades.
flavor: "That's three, Kangor. Three isn't endless."\n- Countess Ashmore

name: Lesser Diamond Spellstone
text: Resurrect 2 different friendly minions. @(Cast 4 spells to upgrade.)
flavor:
A diamond, white, this stone the eighth
A precious jewel for those of faith
A whispered prayer restores the lost
But none among them know the cost.

name: Lesser Mithril Spellstone
text: Summon one 5/5 Mithril Golem. (Equip a weapon to upgrade.)
flavor:
To dwarves of stone the demon called
With promises of might, enthralled
In grasping greed they found their doom
Forever bound in mithril tombs.

name: Lesser Sapphire Spellstone
text: Summon 1 copy of a friendly minion. @(Overload 3 Mana Crystals to upgrade.)
flavor:
A stone of blue, embraced with glee
By murloc lords beneath the sea
Soon numberless they swarmed the shore
First two, then four, then more...and more...

name: Luna's Pocket Galaxy
text: Change the Cost of minions in your\ndeck to (1).
flavor: Luna became head of the astronomy department when her boss invented the Pocket Black Hole.

name: Overflow
text: Restore #5 Health\nto all characters.\nDraw 5 cards.
flavor: It's a high five followed by a low tide.

name: Psychic Scream
text: Shuffle all minions into your opponent's deck.
flavor: Everybody! Hit the deck!

name: Soul Mirror
text: Summon copies of enemy minions. They attack their copies.
flavor: It’s a doppelgang-war!

name: Sprint
text: Draw 4 cards.
flavor: Rogues are not good joggers.

name: Wisps of the Old Gods
text: Choose One - Summon seven 1/1 Wisps; or Give your minions +2/+2.
flavor: They're just normal wisps, actually. The "Of the Old Gods" bit is just marketing.

name: Call of the Wild
text: Summon all three Animal Companions.
flavor: "Hello. Misha, Leokk and Huffer aren't here right now, but if you leave a message we'll get back to you right away." BEEP.

name: Deep Freeze
text: Freeze an enemy. Summon two 3/6 Water Elementals.
flavor: "Dancing with the Satyrs… on Ice!"

name: Demonbolt
text: Destroy a minion. Costs (1) less for each minion you control.
flavor: Or as it’s known in troll, “De bolt, mon.”

name: Dinosize
text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 10.
flavor: Comes with fries and a drink.

name: Free From Amber
text: Discover a minion that costs (8) or more. Summon it.
flavor: Bingo! Minion DNA!

name: Gift of the Wild
text: Give your minions +2/+2 and Taunt.
flavor: The gift that keeps on living.

name: Glacial Mysteries
text: Put one of each Secret from your deck into\nthe battlefield.
flavor: The secret is in the frosting.

name: Inner Demon
text: Give your hero +8_Attack this turn.
flavor: Critical component of any tragic backstory.

name: Lay on Hands
text: Restore #8 Health. Draw_3 cards.
flavor: A grammatically awkward life saver.

name: Power of Creation
text: Discover a 6-Cost minion. Summon two copies of it.
flavor: Mostly used for party tricks, to be honest.

name: The Forest's Aid
text: Twinspell\nSummon five 2/2 Treants.
flavor: Delicious Forest’s Aid! Made from real forests.

name: Tidal Wave
text: Lifesteal\nDeal $3 damage to\nall minions.
flavor: "Hang Four, mon!"

name: Tip the Scales
text: Summon 7 Murlocs from your deck.
flavor: Hold on, I need to get some murlocs to weigh in on this.

name: Twisting Nether
text: Destroy all minions.
flavor: The Twisting Nether is a formless place of magic and illusion and destroyed minions.

name: Void Contract
text: Destroy half of each player's deck.
flavor: “YOU SIGNED WHAT?!”

name: Libram of Hope
text: Restore 8 Health. Summon an 8/8 Guardian with Taunt and_Divine Shield.
flavor: "Think you got lethal? Libram of NOPE!"

name: Mass Resurrection
text: Summon 3 friendly minions that died\nthis game.
flavor: One's company, two's a crowd, and three's a “mass” resurrection, apparently.

name: Plague of Death
text: Silence and destroy all_minions.
flavor: Don't worry, there's a happy little funhouse right under that sand pit.

name: The Boomship
text: Summon 3 random minions from your hand. Give them Rush.
flavor: Dr. Boom ends his motivational speeches by dropping the mechs.

name: Tree of Life
text: Restore all characters to full Health.
flavor: Healing: It grows on trees!

name: Zerek's Cloning Gallery
text: Summon a 1/1 copy of_each minion in your_deck.
flavor: Cloning can be a jarring experience.

name: Anyfin Can Happen
text: Summon 7 Murlocs that died this game.
flavor: Theme song by Ellie Goldfin and Blagghghlrlrl Harris.
howToGet: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

name: Dimensional Ripper
text: Summon 2 copies of a minion in your deck.
flavor: The first dimensional ripper had a point.\nThe second fell flat.\nThe THIRD one really started to take shape!

name: DOOM!
text: Destroy all minions. Draw a card for each.
flavor: We ran out of space for "DOOOOOOOOOOOM!!!!!"

name: Eye of the Storm
text: Summon three 5/6 Elementals with Taunt. Overload: (3)
flavor: If that's the eye, I would hate to see the rest of the storm.

name: Mind Control
text: Take control of an enemy minion.
flavor: Nominated as "Spell Most Likely to Make Your Opponent Punch the Wall."

name: Nagrand Slam
text: Summon four 3/5 Clefthoofs that attack random enemies.
flavor: Come on and slam, and welcome to Nagrand!

name: Puzzle Box of Yogg-Saron
text: Cast 10 random spells (targets chosen randomly).
flavor: "PUT THE BOX DOWN, RENO!"

name: Pyroblast
text: Deal $10 damage.
flavor: Take the time for an evil laugh after you draw this card.

name: Survival of the Fittest
text: Give +4/+4 to all minions in your hand, deck, and battlefield.
flavor: Sometimes the fittest is the one smart enough to not start a fight with seven 6/6 Treants.

name: Ultimate Infestation
text: [x]Deal $5 damage. Draw\n5 cards. Gain 5 Armor.\nSummon a 5/5 Ghoul.
flavor: Ghouls in the pipe, five by five.
